jobs.title: Director of Product, Benefits Marketplace & PEO
jobs.description:
**About Rippling**
------------------


Rippling gives businesses one place to run HR, IT, and Finance. It brings together all of the workforce systems that are normally scattered across a company, like payroll, expenses, benefits, and computers. For the first time ever, you can manage and automate every part of the employee lifecycle in a single system.


Take onboarding, for example. With Rippling, you can hire a new employee anywhere in the world and set up their payroll, corporate card, computer, benefits, and even third\-party apps like Slack and Microsoft 365—all within 90 seconds.


Based in San Francisco, CA, Rippling has raised $1\.4B\+ from the world’s top investors—including Kleiner Perkins, Founders Fund, Sequoia, Greenoaks, and Bedrock—and was named one of America's best startup employers by Forbes.

  

We prioritize candidate safety. Please be aware that all official communication will only be sent from @Rippling.com addresses.

**About the role**
------------------


Every year, employers and employees spend over $5 trillion on benefits globally. From health insurance to saving for retirement, these benefits products guide families through some of the most important and impactful decisions in life.


Despite the significance of these products and the dollars spent, the experience is still painfully antiquated, expensive, and confusing.

  

Rippling is building the first modern marketplace that seamlessly connects brokers, employers, and employees with any benefit. Our platform powers discovery, purchase, and use of benefits products around the world. Our benefits vertical includes our Benefits Platform (recommendations, payments, and our benefits eligibility engine), our rapidly growing Benefits Marketplace of over 100 partners, and our natively\-built Rippling Benefits Products.  

  

We’re looking for a **Director of Product** who will lead the entire Benefits Marketplace in the US and dozens of other countries – as well as the Professional Employer Organization (PEO) offering. This includes new platform capabilities to win upmarket, brand new benefits product offerings, reimagining how employees navigate the complex world of benefits (including through AI\-powered capabilities), making the marketplace a truly compelling experience with the right options for customers of all sizes, and rolling out in new geographies. All of this needs to be done while ensuring the vertical can scale with Rippling’s growth, leverage its unique knowledge of Employee and Organizational Data, and fulfill enrollments with absolute accuracy.

 **What you will do**

* Own the vision and execution of Rippling’s benefits marketplace and PEO
* Build and manage a high\-performing team: lead a team of senior Product Leads with the ability to attract and develop world\-class talent
* Serve as a leader and mentor for the broader Product Management function in Bangalore
* Transform complexity into simplicity by crafting an intuitive, simple experience that works for companies with 1 through 10,000 employees
* Scale our current platform to support tens of millions of employees
* Work cross\-functionally with virtually every team – across product, engineering, design, marketing, and customer\-facing functions – to develop the first modern marketplace for benefits products that can scale to billions in revenue.
* Stay deeply attuned to market trends, customer feedback, and emerging technologies to ensure the Benefits vertical can win with administrators, brokers, and employees against both point solutions and all\-in\-one competitors

**What you will need**
----------------------

* 12\+ years of Product Management experience
* Led both 01 product builds and large\-scale products with millions of active users.
* Self\-starter with a bias towards action
* Ability to thrive in a fast\-paced environment
* Thrives in understanding complexity and transforming it into simple user experiences
* Helicopter pilot mentality \- you can easily switch from high level strategy and planning to UI polish and data model details
* Leads with clarity and inspiration, enabling teams to perform at their peak.
* Possess a deep sense of ownership and responsibility and understand that the buck stops with you
* Strong alignment with our leadership principles: in particular Go and See, and Are Right, a Lot.
* Experience building regulated products in the healthcare, employer benefits, and/or fintech industry will be a plus

jobs.title: Operations Senior Lead, VP
jobs.description:
**Job Description:**
--------------------

**Job Title: Operations Senior Lead, VP**

**Location: Bangalore/ Jaipur, India**

**Role Description**

* Vice President should have an experience of Leading business \& should be managing Delivery, SLA’s, P\&L, Compliance, Employee Engagement, People initiatives and retention, Performance management and Stake holder management. Incumbent should have knowledge of Investment banking and should be familiar with complete business model including 4 business verticals for Deutsche Bank Investment Services i.e., Tax Services, Asset Services, Trade Processing and Operations Control.
* You should be able to maximize efficiency and productivity through extensive process analysis and interdepartmental collaboration

**What we’ll offer you**

As part of our flexible scheme, here are just some of the benefits that you’ll enjoy


* Best in class leave policy
* Gender neutral parental leaves
* 100% reimbursement under childcare assistance benefit (gender neutral)
* Sponsorship for Industry relevant certifications and education
* Employee Assistance Program for you and your family members
* Comprehensive Hospitalization Insurance for you and your dependents
* Accident and Term life Insurance
* Complementary Health screening for 35 yrs. and above

**Your key responsibilities**

* Responsible for managing SLA’s as per agreed Service specifications for all processes under Deutsche Bank Investment Services operations
* Establishes and implements short\- \& long\-range organizational goals, objectives, strategic plans, policies, and operating procedures; monitors and evaluates programmatic and operational effectiveness, and changes required for improvement.
* Set strategic goals for operational efficiency and increased productivity
* Work with project managers in the development of financial and budgetary plans
* Analyze current operational processes and performance, recommending solutions for improvement when necessary
* Build and maintain relationships with all department heads, external partners, and vendors to make decisions regarding operational activity and strategic goals
* Plan, monitor, and analyze key metrics for the day\-to\-day performance of the operations to ensure efficient and timely completion of tasks
* Devise strategies to ensure growth of programs enterprise\-wide, identifying and implementing process improvements that will maximize output and minimize costs
* Uphold organization policies and standards, ensuring legislative regulations are followed
* Work closely with human resources to lead team with integrity and establish and maintain a trusting, inclusive, and productive environment
* Monthly / Quarterly reviews with Client \& Client teams. Weekly / Monthly internal reviews, Service Board Reviews
* End to end management of workforce including position creation and all approvals.
* Ensure all cost targets are met and CPP (Cost per Person is under check)
* Planning \& strategizing BCMS roles and responsibilities
* SLA Management, Meeting Quality targets, Employee engagement and retention, managing controlled attrition, C\-SAT management, Participation in offshoring meetings along with Delivery Assurance
* Handling people related issues and conducting skip meetings/Focus Group meetings and Town Halls.
* Analyzes, designs, documents, and implements internal reporting systems and procedures for the organization or business entity, within specified functional area of operation, as applicable to the specified functional area of focus. Escalation’s handling
* Implement operational improvements, audits \& handling escalations
* Ability to analyze complex problems, interpret operational needs, and develop integrated, creative solutions

**Your skills and experience**

**Basic Qualifications**

* Bachelor's degree/post graduate degree in Management
* Bachelor's degree in business administration, information technology, computer technology or related field preferred
* 16\+ years of overall experience with 8\+ years of leadership experience
* Experience working with business process services and International Banking client.
* Experience in Strategy/policy making, Hiring, Situation handling, Cost management and Account P\&L management
* Complete knowledge of multiple operational functions and principles, including finance, customer service, production, and employee management
* Proven ability to plan and manage operational process for maximum efficiency and productivity
* Ability to streamline and implement new structures and roles that create speed, efficiency, and support rapidly shifting business demand

**Other Qualifications**

* Excellent organizational, communication, and leadership skills, demonstrated by previous professional success
* Superior Communication skills in both internal and external settings
* Strong working knowledge of data analysis and performance metrics using business management
* Presentation skills
* Analytical and business process development skills
* Human relations skills to select, develop, mentor, discipline, and reward employees
* Willingness to travel

**Work Environment**

* Office environment

**How we’ll support you**

* Training and development to help you excel in your career
* Coaching and support from experts in your team
* A culture of continuous learning to aid progression
* A range of flexible benefits that you can tailor to suit your needs

**About us and our teams**

Please visit our company website for further information:


**https://www.db.com/company/company.htm**

We strive for a culture in which we are empowered to excel together every day. This includes acting responsibly, thinking commercially, taking initiative and working collaboratively.


Together we share and celebrate the successes of our people. Together we are Deutsche Bank Group.


We welcome applications from all people and promote a positive, fair and inclusive work environment.

jobs.title: Senior Lead Generation Executive (LGE-02)
jobs.description:
We Promise You An Inclusive Work Environment
  
### **Senior Lead Generation Executive (LGE\-02\)**


#### **Job Description**


Location: Noida/India / Remote (Global B2B Markets)  

Experience: 8–12\+ years in B2B Technology, AI, SaaS, or Services  

Function: Revenue Operations / Growth / Demand Generation


**Role Overview:**  

We are hiring a Senior Lead Generation Executive to own and scale predictable, ROI  

driven pipeline generation across three distinct but complementary business units: Tecorb  

Technologies, Taskadapt, and Tensors.shop  

This is a senior, high\-impact role positioned at the intersection of revenue strategy, data  

driven demand generation, and technical B2B selling. You will not be executing generic  

lead activities; you will architect, optimize, and operate multi\-channel lead engines that  

directly influence revenue, CAC, and long\-term growth.  

The role requires a professional who understands complex technology offerings, long sales  

cycles, enterprise buyers, and how to translate technical value propositions into qualified  

pipeline at scale.


**Business Units You Will Support**  

* Tecorb Technologies – End\-to\-end technology services delivering custom


web/mobile platforms, AI\-driven development, system integrations, and product  

engineering using a 100\+ developer shared delivery model.  

* Taskadapt – Advanced AI systems focused on Pre\-Training Small language models,


Fine\-tuning – LLM and SLM (LoRA, Q\-LoRA), RLHF/GRPO/DPO workflows, and  

production\-grade MLOps for compliant and reasoning\-capable AI.  

* Tensors – White\-label deep learning solutions designed for API integration or on


prem/client\-side deployment to accelerate enterprise AI adoption.  

**Key Responsibilities:**  

1\. **Lead Generation \& Demand Strategy**  

* Own the entire top\-of\-funnel and mid\-funnel pipeline across all three business


units.  

* Design and execute multi\-channel inbound and outbound lead generation


strategies targeting mid\-market and enterprise accounts.  

* Build and optimize ICP\-driven and account\-based lead programs for technology


buyers including CTOs, CIOs, Heads of Engineering, Product Leaders, and AI  

Decision Makers.  

* Align messaging with each business unit’s technical positioning and buyer maturity.


2\. **Outbound \& Account\-Based Execution**  

* Drive high\-quality outbound programs across email, LinkedIn, partnerships, and


curated databases.  

* Develop account segmentation, buying committee mapping, and personalized


outreach frameworks.  

* Collaborate with sales leadership to ensure tight handoff, qualification criteria, and


follow\-up SLAs.  

3\. **Inbound, Content \& Campaign Collaboration**  

* Work with marketing and content teams to convert technical offerings into lead


generating assets.  

* Optimize inbound sources including landing pages, gated content, webinars, and


solution\-led campaigns.  

* Continuously improve conversion rates from MQL to SQL through data\-backed


iteration.  

4\. **Funnel Ownership \& Revenue Alignment**  

* Take end\-to\-end ownership of lead\-to\-opportunity performance.
* Partner closely with sales, delivery, and leadership teams to forecast pipeline


contribution.  

* Ensure lead quality aligns with revenue potential, deal size, and delivery feasibility.


**Technical Skills \& Tools:**  

**CRM \& Revenue Systems**  

* Expertise in CRMs (Any one of) such as HubSpot, Salesforce, Zoho, or equivalent.
* Strong understanding of lead lifecycle stages, scoring models, and automation logic.
* Understanding of how to use automation(Make.com or n8n) on lead\-generations,


Filtering, Lead nurturing, Monitoring.  

**Marketing Automation \& Outreach**  

* Hands\-on experience with tools such as HubSpot Marketing Hub, Marketo, Apollo,


Outreach, Salesloft, or similar platforms.  

* Ability to design and optimize multi\-step outreach sequences with performance


benchmarks.  

**Data Enrichment \& Prospecting**  

* Proficient with tools like Apollo, ZoomInfo, Clearbit, Lusha, Clay, or similar


enrichment stacks.  

* Experience building clean, high\-intent datasets aligned to ICP definitions.


**Analytics, Reporting \& Dashboards**  

* Strong command over funnel analytics, cohort analysis, and attribution reporting.
* Ability to build and interpret dashboards covering pipeline velocity, CAC, conversion


rates, and revenue influence.  

**AI\-Assisted Prospecting**  

* Experience using AI\-powered tools for Automation leads, prospect research,


messaging personalization, and lead prioritization.  

* Comfortable working alongside AI\-driven workflows and data models in a B2B


environment.  

**ROI Measurement \& Performance Metrics**  

You will be accountable for measurable, revenue\-linked outcomes, including but not limited  

to:  

* Marketing Qualified Leads (MQLs) and Sales Qualified Leads (SQLs)
* Lead\-to\-opportunity and opportunity\-to\-win conversion rates
* Pipeline value generated and influenced
* Cost per Lead (CPL) and Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC)
* Channel\-wise ROI and attribution performance
* Pipeline velocity and average deal contribution
* Revenue influenced by lead generation efforts


Attribution models may include first\-touch, multi\-touch, and revenue\-weighted approaches  

depending on campaign structure.  

**Required Experience \& Qualifications**  

* 8\+ years of progressive experience in B2B lead generation, demand generation, or


revenue operations within technology, AI, SaaS, or services companies.  

* Proven track record of building and scaling lead engines for complex, high\-ticket


offerings.  

* Strong understanding of enterprise buying behavior, long sales cycles, and multi


stakeholder deals.  

* Experience working with globally distributed sales and delivery teams.
* Demonstrated ability to work with technical stakeholders and translate complex


offerings into market\-ready positioning.  

**Soft Skills \& Leadership Traits**  

* Highly analytical with a strong ROI and outcome\-oriented mindset.
* Strategic thinker with hands\-on execution capability.
* Strong communication and stakeholder management skills.
* Comfortable operating with ambiguity and evolving business priorities.
* Ownership\-driven, self\-motivated, and performance\-focused.


**Compensation \& Incentives**  

* Fixed Salary: Competitive, aligned with senior market benchmarks.
* Performance\-Based Bonus: Target\-linked incentives tied directly to pipeline


generation, revenue influence, and conversion metrics.  

* Upside Potential: Clear accelerators for exceeding pipeline and revenue targets.


**Career Growth \& Impact**  

* Opportunity to shape the lead generation function across multiple high\-growth AI and


technology businesses.  

* Direct visibility and collaboration with senior leadership and founders.
* Clear pathway toward roles such as Head of Demand Generation, Revenue


**Operations Leader, or Growth Director.**  

* Exposure to cutting\-edge AI, deep learning, and enterprise technology markets.


If you are a senior, performance\-driven lead generation professional who thrives on  

measurable impact, understands complex B2B technology sales, and wants to directly  

influence revenue at scale, we encourage you to apply.  

This role is designed for leaders who want ownership, accountability, and the opportunity to  

build systems that drive sustained business growth.

jobs.title: Senior Principal Consultant- Business Analyst (Agentic -Capture)
jobs.description:
Ready to build the future with AI?  

At Genpact, we don’t just keep up with technology—we set the pace. AI and digital innovation are redefining industries, and we’re leading the charge. Genpact’s AI Gigafactory, our industry\-first accelerator, is an example of how we’re scaling advanced technology solutions to help global enterprises work smarter, grow faster, and transform at scale. From large\-scale models to agentic AI, our breakthrough solutions tackle companies’ most complex challenges.
If you thrive in a fast\-moving, innovation\-driven environment, love building and deploying cutting\-edge AI solutions, and want to push the boundaries of what’s possible, this is your moment.
Genpact (NYSE: G) is an advanced technology services and solutions company that delivers lasting value for leading enterprises globally. Through our deep business knowledge, operational excellence, and cutting\-edge solutions – we help companies across industries get ahead and stay ahead. Powered by curiosity, courage, and innovation, our teams implement data, technology, and AI to create tomorrow, today. Get to know us at genpact.com and on LinkedIn, X, YouTube, and Facebook.
Inviting applications for the role of Senior Principal Consultant\- Business Analyst (Agentic \-Capture)  

The Business Analyst – Agentic (Capture) is responsible for identifying and defining AI\-driven automation opportunities using agentic frameworks (like LangChain, OpenAI APIs, or n8n). This role supports the capture of business requirements and translates them into intelligent, autonomous workflows that enhance decision\-making and operational efficiency.
Responsibilities  

* Capture Business Needs: Engage with stakeholders to gather, analyze, and document business requirements for AI/LLM\-based solutions.
* Design Agentic Workflows: Translate business processes into autonomous, LLM\-enabled workflows using tools like LangChain or similar orchestration frameworks.
* AI Use Case Development: Identify and prioritize use cases for generative AI and agentic automation across departments.
* Collaboration: Work closely with AI/ML engineers, solution designers, and product managers to ensure successful implementation of intelligent agents.
* Testing \& Validation: Develop and execute user test plans, validate outputs, and ensure alignment with business goals.
* Documentation \& Training: Create user documentation and deliver training to ensure smooth adoption of AI solutions..


Qualifications we seek in you!  

Minimum Qualifications / Skills  

* BE/B Tech/ MCA/BCA
* Relevant years of experience in business analysis and in AI/automation projects as well.
* Exposure to enterprise AI adoption or digital transformation initiatives.
* Technical Fluency: Understanding of LLMs, agentic AI, and orchestration tools like LangChain, n8n, or similar.
* Business Analysis: Strong experience in requirements gathering, process mapping, and stakeholder communication
* AI/ML Awareness: Familiarity with generative AI concepts and their application in business settings.
* Project Management: Ability to manage timelines, dependencies, and cross\-functional collaboration.
* Tools Proficiency: Experience with tools like JIRA, Confluence, and data visualization platforms is a plus.


Preferred / Skills  

* Agile / Scrum methodology
* Requirement gathering and documentation (BRD, BSAR, CR document, Change Request)
* Risk \& change management
* Cross\-functional stakeholder communication
* Vendor and client management
* Excellent experience in operations and project management
* Good communication skills, proficient in English
* Experience in problem\-solving and solution design
* Strong in risk handling and proactive planning


Why join Genpact?  

* Lead AI\-first transformation – Build and scale AI solutions that redefine industries
* Make an impact – Drive change for global enterprises and solve business challenges that matter
* Accelerate your career—Gain hands\-on experience, world\-class training, mentorship, and AI certifications to advance your skills
* Grow with the best – Learn from top engineers, data scientists, and AI experts in a dynamic, fast\-moving workplace
* Committed to ethical AI – Work in an environment where governance, transparency, and security are at the core of everything we build
* Thrive in a values\-driven culture – Our courage, curiosity, and incisiveness \- built on a foundation of integrity and inclusion \- allow your ideas to fuel progress


Come join the 140,000\+ coders, tech shapers, and growth makers at Genpact and take your career in the only direction that matters: Up.  

Let’s build tomorrow together.
Genpact is an Equal Opportunity Employer and considers applicants for all positions without regard to race, color, religion or belief, sex, age, national origin, citizenship status, marital status, military/veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity, physical or mental disability or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws. Genpact is committed to creating a dynamic work environment that values respect and integrity, customer focus, and innovation.  

Furthermore, please do note that Genpact does not charge fees to process job applications and applicants are not required to pay to participate in our hiring process in any other way. Examples of such scams include purchasing a 'starter kit,' paying to apply, or purchasing equipment or training.

jobs.title: Senior Business Analyst
jobs.description:
**Posted On:** 16 Feb 2026


**Location:** Noida, UP, India


**Company:** Iris Software


**Why Join Iris?**  

Are you ready to do the best work of your career at one of **India’s Top 25 Best Workplaces in IT industry**? Do you want to grow in an award\-winning culture that **truly values your talent and ambitions**?  

Join Iris Software — one of the **fastest\-growing IT services companies** — where **you own and shape your success story**.

**About Us**  

At Iris Software, our vision is to be our client’s most trusted technology partner, and the first choice for the industry’s top professionals to realize their full potential.
With over 4,300 associates across India, U.S.A, and Canada, we help our enterprise clients thrive with technology\-enabled transformation across financial services, healthcare, transportation \& logistics, and professional services.
Our work covers complex, mission\-critical applications with the latest technologies, such as high\-value complex Application \& Product Engineering, Data \& Analytics, Cloud, DevOps, Data \& MLOps, Quality Engineering, and Business Automation.  


**Working with Us**  

At Iris, every role is more than a job — it’s a launchpad for growth.
Our Employee Value Proposition, **“Build Your Future. Own Your Journey.”** reflects our belief that people thrive when they have ownership of their career and the right opportunities to shape it.
We foster a culture where your potential is valued, your voice matters, and your work creates real impact. With cutting\-edge projects, personalized career development, continuous learning and mentorship, we support you to grow and become your best — both personally and professionally.
Curious what it’s like to work at Iris? Head to this video for an inside look at the people, the passion, and the possibilities. Watch it here.**Job Description**
-------------------


**Key Responsibilities:**  

* Requirement Management \& Documentation:
* Act as a lead liaison with various business stakeholders (including Risk Partners, Finance, and Operations) to meticulously elicit, analyze, and document comprehensive business requirements.
* Translate complex business needs into detailed specifications, creating clear and concise Business Requirement Documents (BRDs) and Functional Specification Documents (FSDs).
* monitor criteria for Significant Increase in Credit Risk (SICR) to accurately classify financial instruments into Stages 1, 2, and 3, ensuring appropriate impairment recognition.
* IFRS 9 ECL Production \& Reporting:
* Actively participate in the monthly/quarterly production and reporting of IFRS 9 Expected Credit Losses, including the calculation of 12\-month and lifetime ECL.
* Actively contribute to the development, validation, and comprehensive documentation of key IFRS 9 components, including PD (Probability of Default), LGD (Loss Given Default), and EAD (Exposure at Default) models.
* NPA Management \& Reporting:
* Monitor and report on non\-performing assets (Stage 3 loans), overseeing the transition of assets into default and ensuring adequate provision coverage in alignment with regulatory guidelines.
* Data Governance \& Analysis:
* Extract, analyze, and validate large datasets from diverse upstream sources (e.g., loan origination systems, collateral management platforms) to ensure high data quality and integrity for ECL engine inputs and NPA reporting.
* Incorporate and analyze macroeconomic scenarios (e.g., GDP growth, unemployment rates, property prices) into ECL calculations to reflect forward\-looking information.
* Stakeholder Engagement \& Cross\-functional Collaboration:
* Collaborate effectively with Risk, Finance, Technology, and other cross\-functional teams throughout the project lifecycle.
* Present insightful analytical findings on portfolio quality, ECL movements, and NPA trends to diverse stakeholders, including risk management, finance, and senior leadership teams.
* Testing \& Validation:
* Develop test plans, scenarios, and execute User Acceptance Testing (UAT) to ensure solutions meet business requirements and are fit for purpose.


Experience:  

* 6\-8 years of proven experience as a Business Analyst in Credit Risk, Risk Management, or Finance within the banking industry.
* Demonstrable experience with IFRS 9 ECL and NPA management.
* Domain Knowledge:
* Strong understanding of IFRS 9 (Impairment Model), including Stage 1, 2, and 3 classification.
* In\-depth knowledge of NPA provisioning and comprehensive credit risk management principles.
* Technical Skills:
* SQL: Advanced proficiency in querying, extracting, and analyzing large datasets from relational databases.
* Data Visualization: Hands\-on experience with tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or similar for creating impactful risk dashboards and reports is desirable.
* Modeling/Statistical Tools: Experience with SAS, Python, R, or VBA is highly desirable for data manipulation and model analysis.
* Excel: Advanced Excel skills, including financial modeling, pivot tables, and VBA for complex analysis.
* Analytical Mindset: Exceptional critical thinking, problem\-solving, and quantitative analysis skills, with a proven ability to interpret and translate complex financial and risk data into actionable insights.
* Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to articulate technical findings and complex risk concepts clearly and concisely to both technical and non\-technical stakeholders.
**Mandatory Competencies**
--------------------------


BA \- Business Analyst \- Requirement Gathering
BA \- Business Analyst \- Root Cause Analysis (RCA)
BA \- Business Knowledge
BA \- Client Interaction
BA \- Communication \- Verbal, Written
BA \- Documentation \- Story Creation, BRD, FRD Creation
BA \- Domain knowledge
BA \- Excel, macros, pivots
BA \- Functional testing
BA \- Presentations and Reports
BA \- Requirement analysis**Perks and Benefits for Irisians**  

Iris provides world\-class benefits for a personalized employee experience. These benefits are designed to support financial, health and well\-being needs of Irisians for a holistic professional and personal growth. Click here to view the benefits.

jobs.title: Category Lead – C2C Services Marketplace
jobs.description:
Position: Category Lead – C2C Marketplace


Location: Bangalore


Working Days: Monday to Friday (hybrid role)


Experience Required: 4\-6 Years


Client: Saas platform for students


**The Role**
------------


We’re hiring a Category Lead – C2C Marketplace to own this vertical end\-to\-end.


This is a rare opportunity for someone who wants to:


* Build a category from scratch
* Work directly with founders
* Take full ownership of execution
* Grow into a leadership role quickly

If you’re imaginative, a hard executor, great with people, and hungry to lead — this role is for you.


**What You’ll Do**
------------------


### **1\. Build the Category from 0****1**


* Define the first use\-cases and service categories to launch
* Help shape the marketplace model, pricing, and operating playbook
* Execute pilots and iterate fast. Design pilots, coordinate with internal and external teams
### **2\. Student Onboarding \& Growth**


* Work closely with the marketing team to ensure high quality messaging is going out to onboard students
* Design basic student training, incentives, engagement, and retention systems
* Build a strong community of trusted student service providers
### **3\. Deliver Trust \& Great Customer Experience**


* Work closely with the marketing team to ensure high quality messaging is going out to onboard individual recruiters. Driving demand will be a key criteria.
* Own quality, safety, ratings, and dispute resolution workflows
* Ensure every booking feels reliable and repeat\-worthy
* Set up simple but scalable SOPs for service fulfilment
### **4\. Drive Growth \& Repeat Usage**


* Work with marketing/product teams to drive demand
* Launch referral, locality\-led growth, and retention loops
* Track key metrics: activation, bookings, repeat rate, satisfaction
### **5\. Grow Into a Leader**


* As the vertical scales, you will hire and lead a team
* Become the business owner for this category over time
* Lead by example. Be fully willing to contribute individually as well as guide a team to drive results
**Who We’re Looking For**
-------------------------


### **Experience**


* 4–6 years in startups, marketplaces, gig platforms, or hyperlocal services
* Proven execution in operations, category building, supply growth, or city launches
* Comfortable working in fast\-moving, ambiguous environments
### **Key Traits (Non\-Negotiable)**


We want someone who is:


* Imaginative — thinks beyond obvious solutions
* A Hard Executor — gets things done, not just plans
* A People Person — can build trust with partners \+ users
* Hungry — wants responsibility, not comfort
* Aspiring Leader — wants to own something big early in life
**Why Join our client?**
------------------------


* Build one of India’s next big consumer categories
* Direct founder mentorship and ownership
* Fast growth into a leadership role
* High autonomy, real responsibility, real impact

jobs.title: Head of Content & Programming - Media & Entertainment
jobs.description:
**Working Days**: 5

**Industry** : Media and entertainment

**Preferred Skill** : Content Vision \& Strategy, Programming \& Genre Mix, Content Creation \& Quality Control, Team Leadership \& Execution, Performance \& Optimisation, Monetisation \& ROI Ownership

**Functions:** Media and Communication

**Experience \- 12yrs\- 15yrs in Industry**

**Remuneration \- 25Lpa \- 30Lpa**

**⚠ Mandatory Criteria \-**

**1\. Relevant Industry Background**

1\. Must have leadership experience in audio/content/OTT platforms such as:Kuku FM, Pocket FM, Pratilipi, Storytel, Reel Saga, Dramabox, StoryBox, Story TV

2\. OR strong content leadership background in digital media, OTT, or radio\-led consumer platforms.

**2\. End\-to\-End Content Ownership**

l 12–15\+ years in media/content ecosystems.

l Must have owned full content vision, genre strategy, and programming roadmap — not just individual shows.

l Demonstrated leadership in building scalable original IPs and content verticals.

**3\. Programming \& Editorial Depth**

l Proven experience curating genre mix across audio/video formats.

l Strong editorial judgment in greenlighting commercially viable original content.

l Experience designing seasonal calendars, tentpole strategies, and differentiated platform identity.

**4\. Performance \& Monetisation Accountability**

l Track record of linking content strategy to measurable metrics: retention, completion rates, subscriber growth, and revenue per IP.

l Strong understanding of content monetisation models (ads, branded integrations, sponsorships, subscription).

l Must have owned ROI accountability for content investments.

**5\. Team \& Cross\-Functional Leadership**

l Experience leading producers, commissioning teams, writers, editors, and creative partners.

l Built SOPs for production, publishing, and content lifecycle management.

l Worked closely with Growth, Marketing, Sales, and Tech to align content with business impact.

**Job Description**

**Role Purpose:**

To own the end\-to\-end content vision, programming strategy, genre mix, and ROI for the BIG App — transforming it into a compelling destination for high\-quality, original, and commercially viable content.

This leader will balance creative excellence with business impact, ensuring content not only engages audiences but also drives retention, monetisation, and brand equity.

**Key Responsibilities**

**1️ Content Vision \& Strategy**

l Define the long\-term content roadmap aligned with BIG FM’s brand legacy and digital\-first ambitions

l Build a differentiated content identity for the BIG App across audio, video, and interactive community formats

l Identify high\-potential genres and audience segments based on market research and platform insights

**2️ Programming \& Genre Mix**

l Curate and optimise the genre mix (talk shows, storytelling, celebrity\-led formats, infotainment, podcasts, culture, youth content, etc.)

jobs.title: Senior Engagement Lead - Omnichannel Analytics
jobs.description:
**About Us:**

ProcDNA is a global rocket ship in life sciences consulting. We fuse design thinking with cutting\-edge tech to create game\-changing Commercial Analytics and Technology solutions for our clients. We're a passionate team of 300\+ across 6 offices, all growing and learning together since our launch during the pandemic. Here, you won't be stuck in a cubicle \- you'll be out in the open water, shaping the future with brilliant minds. Ready to join our epic growth journey?


**Role Overview:**

We are seeking a proven leader in **Omnichannel Analytics** to drive strategy, client success, and delivery excellence across large, complex omnichannel engagements. In this senior role, you will influence cross\-functional teams, drive growth, lead analytical solutioning, and act as a trusted advisor for life sciences clients seeking end\-to\-end omnichannel transformation.


You will work closely with client commercial teams, marketing stakeholders, and cross\-functional analytics teams to drive actionable insights and measurable ROI improvement.


**Key Responsibilities:**

**Client \& Delivery Management**

**Team Leadership**

* Manage and mentor a team of analysts/consultants.

**Required Qualifications:**

* 5 â€“9 years of experience in marketing analytics / omnichannel analytics (life sciences preferred).
* Strong understanding of customer journey analytics, campaign measurement, and channel effectiveness.
* Experience with attribution models, test\-control frameworks, and ROI measurement.
* Proficiency in SQL and at least one analytics language (Python/R).
* Experience working with CRM data (Veeva/Salesforce), digital engagement data, and claims/secondary data is a plus.
* Strong client communication and presentation skills.
* Experience managing small teams (2 â€“6 members) preferred.

**Preferred Experience:**

* Pharma commercial analytics exposure (Oncology/Rare disease preferred).
* Experience with omnichannel platforms and marketing automation tools.
* Exposure to MMM, NBA models, or advanced analytics frameworks.

**What Weâ€™re Looking For:**

* Structured problem\-solver with strong business acumen.
* Ability to balance hands\-on analytics with stakeholder management.
* Ownership mindset with focus on measurable impact.

jobs.title: Senior Product Manager - Platform Efficiency & COGS
jobs.description:
**Senior Product Manager – Platform Efficiency \& COGS**
--------------------------------------------------------


### **About the Role**



As a Senior Product Manager for Platform Efficiency, you will drive continual "cost to value" alignment by delivering the product features and platform enhancements that ensure durable efficiency of scale. You will sit at the intersection of Product, Engineering, FinOps, and Pricing \- responsible for the architectural efficiency and gross margin health of our global SaaS analytics platform.



Sumo Logic processes hundreds of terabytes of data daily. Your mission is to ensure that as we scale, our infrastructure costs stay lean and our platform remains a performant, competitive, and high\-margin engine. You will own the strategy for optimizing data ingestion, storage, networking, and compute costs while simultaneously improving the platform's performance and reliability.


### **Key Responsibilities**


* **COGS Strategy \& Roadmap:** Own the end\-to\-end roadmap for platform efficiency. Identify, prioritize, and execute initiatives that reduce cost\-to\-serve without compromising customer experience or SLAs. Own product strategy to focus on customer margins across multiple Sumologic revenue products
* **Infrastructure Optimization:** Collaborate with Core Platform and Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) teams to optimize resource allocation across Kubernetes, Kafka, and AWS services (S3, DynamoDB, EC2\).
* **Cost Observability:** Partner with FinOps to ensure internal "Cost Observability" dashboards inform continual efficiency improvements. Use data to identify "hot spots" in our AWS/Cloud infrastructure and drive targeted architectural shifts.
* **Product Improvement Lifecycle:** Translate complex technical bottlenecks into actionable PRDs. Define "Definition of Done" for efficiency projects, focusing on metrics like *Cost per GB Ingested* and Cost of Query engine, CPU utilisation of engineering assemblies.
* **Cross\-Functional Leadership:** Coordinate across Finance, UX, and Engineering stakeholders to deliver cost optimized solutions that meet the needs of customers as well as the financial goals of the business. Clearly articulate the financial impacts of technical debt and infrastructure modernization to executive stakeholders.
* **Vendor \& Cloud Management:** Work with cloud providers and 3rd party vendors to optimize licensing, reserved instances, and usage\-based billing models.

### **What We're Looking For**


* **Technical Depth:** You have a solid understanding of cloud\-native architectures, distributed systems, and microservices. Experience with **AWS cost structures** and **FinOps** principles is a major plus.
* **Data\-Driven Mindset:** You are a power user of data analytics tools and have a strong hold on cost and numbers. You don't just report data; you find the "why" behind the numbers to drive strategic pivots.
* **SaaS Savvy:** 5\+ years of PM experience, ideally in a technical platform role within an Enterprise SaaS environment (Log Analytics, Observability, or Cybersecurity).
* **Execution Focus:** Proven track record of taking high\-level efficiency goals and breaking them down into testable hypotheses and delivered features.
* **Communication:** Ability to explain the ROI of a "refactoring project" to a non\-technical stakeholder just as clearly as you can discuss API rate\-limiting with a Principal Engineer.


**Pricing Knowledge: Experience with pricing, units of measure, and cost modeling.**


### **Technical Toolkit (Nice to Have)**


* Experience with Big Data technologies (Lucene, Parquet, Spark).
* Familiarity with billing and provisioning systems (e.g., Zuora).
* Understanding of OpenTelemetry (OTel) and its impact on data pipeline efficiency.

### **Why Join Sumo Logic?**



You will be working on one of the largest scale data problems in the industry. Your work directly impacts the company's bottom line and determines our ability to innovate by freeing up capital for new product investments.


**About Us**
------------



Sumo Logic, Inc. helps make the digital world secure, fast, and reliable by unifying critical security and operational data through its Intelligent Operations Platform. Built to address the increasing complexity of modern cybersecurity and cloud operations challenges, we empower digital teams to move from reaction to readiness—combining agentic AI\-powered SIEM and log analytics into a single platform to detect, investigate, and resolve modern challenges. Customers around the world rely on Sumo Logic for trusted insights to protect against security threats, ensure reliability, and gain powerful insights into their digital environments. For more information, visit www.sumologic.com.



Sumo Logic Privacy Policy. Employees will be responsible for complying with applicable federal privacy laws and regulations, as well as organizational policies related to data protection.

jobs.title: AVP - Senior Lead Engineer – Investment Platform
jobs.description:
We are M\&G Global Services Private Limited (formerly known as 10FA India Private Limited, and prior to that Prudential Global Services Private Limited). We are a fully owned subsidiary of the M\&G group of companies, operating as a Global Capability Centre providing a range of value adding services to the Group since 2003\.
Our purpose is to give everyone real confidence to put their money to work. With a heritage dating back more than 175 years, we have a long history of innovation in savings and investments, combining asset management and insurance expertise to offer a wide range of solutions.
Our two distinct operating segments, Asset Management and Life, work together to provide access to balanced, long\-term investment and savings solutions.
M\&G Global Services has rapidly transformed itself into a powerhouse of capability that is playing an important role in M\&G’s ambition to be the best loved and most successful savings and investments company in the world.
Our diversified service offerings extending from Digital Services (Digital Engineering, AI, Advanced Analytics, RPA, and BI \& Insights), Business Transformation, Management Consulting \& Strategy, Finance, Actuarial, Quants, Research, Information Technology, Customer Service, Risk \& Compliance and Audit provide our people with exciting career growth opportunities. Through our behaviours of telling it like it is, owning it now, and moving it forward together with care and integrity; we are creating an exceptional place to work for exceptional talent.
We are seeking a “Senior Lead Engineer” for Investment Platform with the right blend of software engineering and data skills, and domain knowledge to help us expand our digital capability. There will be significant focus on working with outcome delivery managers, change managers, multiple change and run teams of technology partners to deliver the Investment Platform objectives.
We have a diverse workforce and an inclusive culture at M\&G Global Services, regardless of gender, ethnicity, age, sexual orientation, nationality, disability or long term condition, we are looking to attract, promote and retain exceptional people. We also welcome those who take part in military service and those returning from career breaks.

jobs.title: Senior Product Manager, Customer Experience
jobs.description:
**DESCRIPTION**
---------------


Amazon.com, Inc. seeks to be Earth's most customer\-centric company, where customers can find and discover anything they might want to buy online, and endeavors to offer its customers the widest of selection at low price that drives Amazon's flywheel.  

  

The vision of Retail Business Services (RBS) Organization at Amazon is to accelerate Amazon's flywheel by improving Customer Experience (CX) and enabling our Selling Partners (SPs) to grow their business with Amazon. As an AI\-powered tech\-product organization, RBS provides catalog augmentation and correction technologies for Amazon's retail ecosystem, that find defects at scale and build accountability with upstream teams. Leveraging its rich repository of defect intelligence across all shopping stages, RBS builds predictive tech solutions that inform and influence multiple internal systems \- preventing customer experience degradation before it occurs rather than fixing it after the fact, thereby acting as Amazon's last line of defense against poor customer experience.  

  

RBS is seeking a Senior Product Manager to lead and build strategic enabler tools that accelerate hypothesis validation and customer experience optimization across Amazon's retail ecosystem. This role sits at the intersection of customer experience optimization and rapid experimentation, driving the development of platforms that enable teams to quickly test, benchmark, and validate customer experience improvements through predictive analytics, rapid experimentation capabilities, and customer feedback mechanisms.  

  

Key job responsibilities  

Customer experience defects across Amazon's shopping journey can significantly impact customer satisfaction and conversion. As a Senior Product Manager \- Enabler tools, you will:  

  

1\. Think Big and own vision and definition for the products enabling teams to quickly test customer experience hypotheses.  

2\. Disambiguate the problem space and Size the opportunity for accelerating validation cycles from months to weeks or hours through predictive analytics.  

3\. Be responsible for end\-to\-end business strategy, goal setting, product management, review and collaboration mechanisms  

4\. Establish listening mechanisms to understand customer experience defects and benchmark them against Best in Class experiences and convert them into hypotheses to be validated  

5\. Be responsible for end\-to\-end product management with multiple parallel workstreams across different systems  

6\. Identify risks and develop strategies to mitigate them across complex cross\-system dependencies  

7\. Be responsible for reporting and review mechanisms and communication to Leadership (Flash updates, WBR, QBR, Deep dives)  

  

To be successful in this role, you should be comfortable and confident liaising with remote global teams in business and technology at senior leadership levels. You will be data\-driven and demonstrate good judgment in how and when to escalate (without damaging relationships). Representing the voice of the customer (internal \& external), you will be an evangelist for the product vision, maintaining support for your cause, keeping engineering teams energized and excited, and driving your product roadmap at all levels. You will be very comfortable with written communication skills and a proven track record of delivering products from concept to launch. An AI\-first mindset and experience building AI\-based solutions will be critical for success in this role.

**BASIC QUALIFICATIONS**
------------------------

* 5\+ years of product or program management, product marketing, business development or technology experience
* Experience owning/driving roadmap strategy and definition
* Experience with end to end product delivery
* Experience owning technology products
* Experience working across functional teams and senior stakeholders

**PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS**
----------------------------

* Master's degree or equivalent
* 5\+ years of end to end product delivery experience

  

Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how\-we\-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.

jobs.title: Principal Product Manager
jobs.description:
**Job Title**


Principal Product Manager
We are looking for an experienced Product Manager, with 10\+ years of experience, to take on a role in the Offer domain, responsible for the definition of the end\-to\-end solution for Revenue Management, a given scope within the Offer Optimization portfolio. The Product Manager will collaborate with other PMs working in adjacent areas, Product Marketing Managers, Engineers and Commercial teams, to build a coherent solution moving forward.


In this role, (s)he will put together a comprehensive solution strategy \& positioning approach to meet the airline business needs of managing the offers they wish to sell, this includes:

* Understanding business and commercial market dynamics
* Articulating the functional and non\-functional requirements
* Integrating constraints \& considerations for the Airlines and Amadeus distribution ecosystem
* Understanding and monitoring competition, the market and industry players (ex. IATA, ATPCo) positioning and trends


(S)he is responsible for ensuring the creation of feasible and sustainable solutions and defining a transition plan from the current to future state, by:

* Collaborating with a wide range of internal stakeholders in the broader business unit, R\&D, Sales, Pre\-sales, as well as airlines customers to identify and define market and business needs,
* Defining the Product Vision, Roadmap, and transition plan required to meet these needs,
* Working with multiple Agile Release Trains (ARTs) in delivering value

**Your Main Responsibilities:**

* Deliver relevant and impactful presentations to potential customers, leveraging the airline and other industry expertise to demonstrate the value of your Offer products
* Work with customers from proof of concept to once they have signed and implemented the solution to demonstrate the business value, ensuring adoption and a positive perception of the solution.
* Work with various Product Managers to ensure that we clearly articulate the vision and strategy and translate that into an achievable plan to ensure Amadeus delivers a first in class Offer Management Solution. This includes Offer Creation (inventory, ancillary services, interline etc etc), as well as Pricing and Offer Optimization
* Partner with the broader Product Management and Engineering Community to ensure the on\-time delivery of customer centric value added evolutions of the solution scope end\-to\-end, taking into account the impact on touchpoints, data, revenue accounting, etc.
* Develop the go\-to\-market plan working in partnership with Product Marketing Management, Go\-to\-market and account teams
* Participate, where necessary, in the IATA and other industry working groups, advocating for industry transformation that supports Amadeus long term objectives and drives sustainable growth for our airlines.
* Build the sales pipeline partnering with the sales, pre\-sales and account teams to identify customer targets and empower them to deliver messages that resonate.

**Required skills and qualifications:**

* The product manager should have experience in


	+ Strategic thinking \& product management practises
	+ Airline / Travel domain
	+ Perform market analysis and competitive analysis
	+ Leading customer interaction and management.
* Have subject matter expertise in Revenue Management
* You will operate in SAFe environment with a wide range of teams, people \& customers to identify and define product, market and business needs. (Good to have)
* You are interested in Airline Industry (IATA, ATPCo)

  



**You might love this PM position if**

* You love to think how to bring maximum business value in your daily work,
* You are obsessed with understanding, identifying, and defining customer needs,
* You love to design new capabilities, establish its roadmap, and lead the product features definitions,
* You love to set and foster wonderful team spirit, whatever you do and wherever you go,
* You love to think out\-of\-the\-box to shape the future of airline accounting and Retailing.

**Diversity \& Inclusion**


Amadeus aspires to be a leader in Diversity and Inclusion in the tech industry, enabling every employee to reach their full potential by fostering a culture of belonging and fair treatment, attracting the best talent from all backgrounds, and as a role model for an inclusive employee experience.


Amadeus is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to gender, race, ethnicity, sexual orientation, age, beliefs, disability or any other characteristics protected by law.

The Registration and Verification team's mission is to: (a) verify the identity of every person and business selling on Amazon through the Seller lifecycle, (b) make it simple and fast for Sellers to register globally, and (c) continuously improve operations to achieve accuracy, speed, and scale. When we are successful, we build trust with our Customers and enable Marketplace growth.  

We are seeking a seasoned product leader who can help us raise the bar on creating a world\-class verification experience for 3P Selling Partners who want to sell on Amazon stores. The ideal candidate must be able to influence across multiple company organizations, be an exceptionally strong communicator and analytical thinker and have a history of delivering results. This person will have solved complicated problems with elegant, simple solutions. The individual must be able to thrive and succeed in an entrepreneurial environment, and not be hindered by ambiguity or competing priorities. High judgment, ability to influence, analytical talent, and leadership are essential to success in this role.  

  

As a seasoned Product Manager, you will demonstrate the following skills:  

* Product strategy and direction: Continually assess the needs of our customers and partners in defining and evolving the product and business strategy.
* Roadmap Planning: Deliver world\-class innovation in features, usability and product performance in a consistent cadence of releases. Be the internal and external authority and advocate for your program. Ensure consistent execution of product lifecycle processes from concept to launch, driving value\-based prioritization of product development initiatives to ensure maximum ROI.
* Requirements Definition: Develop comprehensive product plans incorporating customer needs, defining the competitive arena, and establishing the objectives, strategies, and actions required to achieve business goals. Produce high\-quality requirements docs and effectively prioritize and manage the scope of each product launch to deliver key capabilities on time and on budget.
* Work with the tech teams to craft business requirement documents, influence design and architecture of technical solutions

  

Key job responsibilities  

* Collaborate with multiple teams to define the strategy, vision, and features for an upcoming product launch
* Own the product backlog and the Business Requirements Document, determine the prioritization and make feature trade\-offs
* Deliver the product by working with a wide set of cross\-functional teams including Engineering, Legal, Information Security, UX Designers.
**BASIC QUALIFICATIONS**
------------------------

* 5\+ years of product or program management, product marketing, business development or technology experience
* Bachelor's degree
* Experience with feature delivery and tradeoffs of a product
* Experience owning/driving roadmap strategy and definition
* Experience with end to end product delivery
* Experience contributing to engineering discussions around technology decisions and strategy related to a product
* Experience managing technical products or online services
* Experience in representing and advocating for a variety of critical customers and stakeholders during executive\-level prioritization and planning

**PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS**
----------------------------

* Experience in using analytical tools, such as Tableau, Qlikview, QuickSight
* Experience in building and driving adoption of new tools

  

Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how\-we\-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.

jobs.title: Senior Product Manager - Tech, Amazon Appstore
jobs.description:
**DESCRIPTION**
---------------


Join the Amazon Appstore team where we delight customers across devices with a vast selection of relevant apps, games, and services by making it effortless for developers to deliver delightful app experiences.  

  

We are seeking a Senior Product Manager to lead our multi\-year vision for developer app distribution and publishing experiences. If you're passionate about building products at global scale, creating elegant solutions for complex problems, and empowering developers to delight customer, we want to hear from you.  

  

Key job responsibilities  

* Shape Product Strategy: Define and deliver our multi\-year vision and product strategy for an intuitive and fast app publishing experience. Own critical performance metrics for developer experiences and drive continuous improvement.
* Champion Developer Success: Act as a passionate advocate for 1P and 3P developers, leveraging data insights, developer feedback, and cross\-functional inputs from our research, marketing, business development and solution architect team to identify and eliminate bottlenecks in the app publishing journey. Design experiences that enable developers to focus on building great customer experiences rather than wrestling with release management.
* Drive Cross\-Functional Impact: Collaborate with Appstore teams, internal developers, and key 3P developer stakeholders to improve developer velocity. Champion cross\-OS development initiatives to reduce the cost of making apps available across the entire Amazon Device ecosystem.
* Lead with Global Perspective: Work with our high\-energy, geographically distributed team across India and US regions. Build product experiences and technical solutions that deliver meaningful business impact in rapidly growing markets
**BASIC QUALIFICATIONS**
------------------------

* 5\+ years of technical product or program management experience
* Bachelor's degree
* Experience owning/driving roadmap strategy and definition
* Experience with feature delivery and tradeoffs of a product
* Experience contributing to engineering discussions around technology decisions and strategy related to a product
* Experience managing technical products or online services

**PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS**
----------------------------

* Experience in using analytical tools, such as Tableau, Qlikview, QuickSight
* Experience in building and driving adoption of new tools
* Experience in representing and advocating for a variety of critical customers and stakeholders during executive\-level prioritization and planning

  

Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. jobs.title: Global Head of Data Platform Engineering - Managing Director
jobs.description:
State Street Investment Management (SSIM)—formerly State Street Global Advisors (SSGA)—is seeking an accomplished senior leader to serve as the Global Head of Data Platform Engineering. This Managing Director role is critical to shaping, driving, and executing the data strategy that underpins the Investment Management division’s transformation.
As a strategic partner to the Global Head of Data, Analytics, and AI Services (DAAIS), you will oversee all data engineering work that transforms legacy data systems in a siloed environment to a unified cloud\-first data platform supporting all data services provided by the COO organization to SSIM globally. You will lead global teams responsible for platform engineering, software engineering, DevOps, FinOps, tools and framework adoption related to open architecture, data computing engines, ingestion/consumption engines, data federation, and implementation of unified data governance—ensuring alignment with GTS standards and the target data ecosystem blueprint.
This is a senior global role requiring deep expertise in modern data platform architecture, platform engineering, data pipelines, real time communication engine, and modern development of unified data governance like lineage and quality controls, combined with significant leadership experience in asset management.
Key Responsibilities
Leadership \& Strategy* Support SSIM’s data vision and strategy; lead end‑to‑end implementation of data platform infrastructure, data engineering, software development, modern data computing engines, catalog management, frameworks, tooling, DevOps, and FinOps.
* Lead and mentor high‑performing engineering teams across the US, India, and China—building a culture grounded in deep technology expertise and accountability (not traditional staff‑augmentation models).
* Define SSIM’s Data Platform architecture, establish engineering standards, and guide implementation and governance practices.
* Ensure an open, modular, scalable, and reusable architecture to eliminate siloed development and accelerate time to market.
* Champion engineering excellence, technical rigor, and innovation across the organization.


Engineering Excellence* Cloud\-Native Engineering: Implement a “cloud\-first” ecosystem leveraging containerized and service\-based architectures (e.g. Kubernetes, Microservices)
* Architecture Execution: Build and maintain a Single Source of Truth (SSOT) utilizing the separation of compute and storage to ensure scalability, interoperability, and cost efficieny.
* Data Democratization: Develop robust data federation and data sharing capabilities to enable seamless access across global business.
* Real\-time Transformation: Shift the organization from batch\-oriented processing to a real\-time, event\-driven data architecture.
* Innovation \& Best Practices: Evaluate, adopt, and standardize cutting‑edge technology capabilities—including open architecture, open format, separation of storage and compute, extraction and transformation by minimizing loading, open\-source computing engines for structure and unstructured data, distributed computing, and HADR.
* Quality \& Performance: Ensure solutions meet the highest engineering standards through code reviews, testing frameworks, and adherence to industry guidelines.
* Collaboration \& Mentorship: Build a collaborative engineering community focused on continuous learning, knowledge sharing, and professional development.
* Scalability \& Resilience: Architect systems capable of supporting global business workloads with strong reliability and performance characteristics.
* Security \& Compliance: Uphold stringent risk, security, and regulatory requirements; ensure robust data protection and governance.


Execution \& Oversight* Lead global data platform engineering teams with a focus on innovation, delivery excellence, and operating leverage.
* Manage major vendor relationships—including data platform providers and service partners—ensuring strong integration, service quality, and contractual outcomes.
* Oversee the full data servce capability deployment required environment from sandbox, development, QA/UAT, production, to disaster recovery across a diverse set of use cases and global users.


Qualifications* Experience: minimum of 20 years in data technology with at least 15 years in high\-scale engineering leadership.
* Hard\-code background: Proven track record of personally designing and deploying global\-scale data platforms using open architecture, open formats (e.g. Iceberg, Parquet) and modern stack components.
* Scale: Demonstrated ability to manage multi\-jurisdictional teams (including offshore/onshore models) to deliver complex, multi\-year transformation.
* Industry context: Deep understanding of the data performance requirements within institutional Asset Management or Wealth Management.
* Education: Advanced degree (MSc or PhD) in Computer Science, Data Science or related technical field is highly preferred.
* Risk excellence: Ability to embed security and controls directly into the CI/CD pipeline and data fabric.
* Expertise in Modern Data Stack (Public Cloud, Snowflake/Databricks, Spark, Kafka, Flink, and open sources solutions for structured and unstructured data).
* Deep knowledge of Open Architecture principles and data product as service delivery.
* Strong Negotiation and Political Agility to break down silos in a matrixed global environment.
* Strong understanding of the data vendor landscape and demonstrated experience adopting vendor products and open‑source frameworks to improve scale and growth.
* Fluent in English; highly detail‑oriented, results‑driven, candid, and execution‑focused.


Highly Preferred* Prior data platform engineering leadership experience in large financial institution.
* CFA Level I or equivalent credential.


About State Street
State Street is one of the world’s largest custodian banks, asset managers, and providers of data and analytics. For more than two centuries, we have helped institutional clients safeguard investments and drive innovation across financial services.
We are committed to creating a supportive, inclusive culture and offer comprehensive benefits, flexible work programs, professional development, and community engagement opportunities worldwide.
State Street is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer.
About State Street
Across the globe, institutional investors rely on us to help them manage risk, respond to challenges, and drive performance and profitability. We keep our clients at the heart of everything we do, and smart, engaged employees are essential to our continued success.
We are committed to fostering an environment where every employee feels valued and empowered to reach their full potential. As an essential partner in our shared success, you’ll benefit from inclusive development opportunities, flexible work\-life support, paid volunteer days, and vibrant employee networks that keep you connected to what matters most. Join us in shaping the future.
As an Equal Opportunity Employer, we consider all qualified applicants for all positions without regard to race, creed, color, religion, national origin, ancestry, ethnicity, age, disability, genetic information, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, citizenship, marital status, domestic partnership or civil union status, familial status, military and veteran status, and other characteristics protected by applicable law.
Discover more information on jobs at StateStreet.com/careers
Read our CEO Statement

jobs.title: Director - Innovation & Category Finance
jobs.description:
Welcome to The Coca\-Cola Company, where we are not just a beverage company, but a global institution that cherishes innovation and leadership. We are on the lookout for a seasoned Director of Finance with a sharp focus on Financial Planning and Analysis. The ideal candidate is a strategic thinker that is ready to guide our fiscal operations and contribute to our rich legacy of success and industry leadership.

**What We’ll Do For You**

* Developing, implementing, and maintaining the financial planning and policies.
* Establishing solid fiscal controls, preparing financial statements, monitoring relations with the investment and banking communities, and advising management on financial affairs.
* Leading the Financial Planning \& Analysis team in the development and monitoring of annual revenue/expense budgets and measuring annual operating results.
* Overseeing both short and long\-term financial planning and financial analysis of business operations to forecast and measure future business performance.
* Managing the preparation, distribution of all internal and external financial reports, and maintaining corporate financial systems.
* Configuring, maintaining, and generating reports from our finance information system, ensuring accuracy and reliability in financial reporting.
* Manages discussions to facilitate strategic decisions and tradeoffs across the system to assess customer and marketing investment, as well as productivity opportunities by partnering with stakeholders.
* Develops valuation models based on research of value drivers, economic environment of country, cost structures, pricing standards, prospects, and market information.
* Develops an in\-depth understanding of the system revenue performance of the business unit and drives for automation. Leading the digitizing of our finance workflows and processes and owning the design and deployment of multi\-dimensional models that leverage a data framework representing single sources of truth across multiple use cases.

**Qualifications \& Requirements**

* Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, Business Administration, or a relevant field, with an MBA or equivalent preferred.
* 5 \+ experience in Forecasting, Data Modeling and Visualization, Automation, and Business Analytics, Business Planning.
* Proven expertise in leading operational strategies within finance, as well as managing projects and resources.
* Experience leveraging skills in project management; change management; process development/improvement; and strong negotiation and collaboration is needed.
* Experience with data management methods, analytics deployment and orchestration tools, database and visualization tools for customer facing applications is needed.
* Experience synthesizing large, complex data sets from various sources and building machine learning models, data science methods, and analytics is needed.
* Must possess exceptional communication skills (story telling) evidenced by good verbal/written presentation ability.

**What We’ll Do For You**

* Empower your Career: Join a team where you can lead critical financial operations, offering ample opportunities for growth in a global and dynamic work environment.
* Collaborative Culture: We work cross\-functionally, across business units to ensure you’ve got the tools, resources, and thought\-leadership to create the most comprehensive financial business modules, which enables us to make sound business decisions.
* Global Reach: We have the most advanced financial modeling that allows for global financial analysis which leads the industry.
  


Annual Incentive Reference Value Percentage:30  

Annual Incentive reference value is a market\-based competitive value for your role. It falls in the middle of the range for your role, indicating performance at target.

jobs.title: Lead Consultant, Senior QA
jobs.description:
Ready to build the future with AI?  

At Genpact, we don’t just keep up with technology—we set the pace. AI and digital innovation are redefining industries, and we’re leading the charge. Genpact’s AI Gigafactory, our industry\-first accelerator, is an example of how we’re scaling advanced technology solutions to help global enterprises work smarter, grow faster, and transform at scale. From large\-scale models to agentic AI, our breakthrough solutions tackle companies’ most complex challenges.  

If you thrive in a fast\-moving, innovation\-driven environment, love building and deploying cutting\-edge AI solutions, and want to push the boundaries of what’s possible, this is your moment.  

Genpact (NYSE: G) is an advanced technology services and solutions company that delivers lasting value for leading enterprises globally. Through our deep business knowledge, operational excellence, and cutting\-edge solutions – we help companies across industries get ahead and stay ahead. Powered by curiosity, courage, and innovation, our teams implement data, technology, and AI to create tomorrow, today. Get to know us at genpact.com and on LinkedIn, X, YouTube, and Facebook.  

Inviting applications for the role of Lead Consultant, Senior QA  

We are seeking a detail\-oriented and proactive QA Automation Engineer with expertise in API automation using REST Assured and UI automation using Cypress.io. You will be part of a cross\-functional Agile team, contributing to high\-quality software delivery through robust automation frameworks, continuous testing, and integration of quality practices within the SDLC. This role requires strong hands\-on experience with Java and JavaScript/TypeScript, a deep understanding of software testing principles, and familiarity with modern DevOps tools and cloud environments  

Responsibilities  

* Design, develop, and maintain robust test automation frameworks for API and UI testing.
* Write and execute automated test cases using REST Assured (API) and Cypress.io (UI).
* Collaborate with developers, product managers, and other QA engineers to ensure high\-quality deliverables.
* Integrate test automation with CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, GitHub Actions, or GitLab CI.
* Perform test execution, reporting, and defect tracking.
* Work with tools like Postman and Swagger for API validation and documentation.
* Ensure high test coverage and improve test efficiency using modern reporting tools like Allure or Extent Reports.
* Contribute to a scalable QA strategy and continuously enhance testing processes.

Qualifications we seek in you!  

Minimum Qualifications / Skills  

* Experience working in the fintech industry or with digital wallets, payment systems, or similar applications.
* Expertise in micro\-frontend architectures and scalable web applications.
* Knowledge of performance testing tools.
* Exposure to BDD frameworks.
* Familiarity with Test Case Management tools.
* Understanding of microservices architecture and how to test distributed systems.
* Proficient with modern front\-end build tools like Webpack, Vite, or similar bundlers.
* Strong debugging and profiling skills to identify bottlenecks and optimize web applications.
* Exceptional problem\-solving abilities and the ability to approach complex challenges with innovative solutions.
* Excellent communication skills, including the ability to explain complex technical concepts clearly and effectively to non\-technical stakeholders.


Preferred Qualifications/ Skills  

* Strong understanding of QA methodologies, testing types (manual and automated), and SDLC
* Proficiency in test automation tools: Selenium, Cypress, Playwright, JUnit, TestNG, etc.
* Experience with scripting languages: JavaScript, Python, or Java
* REST API testing tools: Postman, Swagger, RestAssured
* Familiarity with CI/CD tools: Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps
* Version control systems: Git, GitHub, GitLab
* Experience with cloud platforms (Azure) is a plus
* Excellent analytical and troubleshooting skills
* Strong verbal and written communication
* Leadership and mentoring capabilities
* Detail\-oriented with a passion for quality
* Collaborative mindset and a proactive attitude
  

Why join Genpact?  

* Lead AI\-first transformation – Build and scale AI solutions that redefine industries
* Make an impact – Drive change for global enterprises and solve business challenges that matter
* Accelerate your career—Gain hands\-on experience, world\-class training, mentorship, and AI certifications to advance your skills
* Grow with the best – Learn from top engineers, data scientists, and AI experts in a dynamic, fast\-moving workplace
* Committed to ethical AI – Work in an environment where governance, transparency, and security are at the core of everything we build
* Thrive in a values\-driven culture – Our courage, curiosity, and incisiveness \- built on a foundation of integrity and inclusion \- allow your ideas to fuel progress


Come join the 140,000\+ coders, tech shapers, and growth makers at Genpact and take your career in the only direction that matters: Up.  

Let’s build tomorrow together.
