Job Code: KL\-JFMWB4DP
About Us
As our planet faces the alarming reality of warming temperatures, India is confronting a critical challenge: by 2030, heat stress events could cost the nation 34 million full\-time jobs—equivalent to 5\.8% of its working hours. In this context, HVAC systems are no longer a luxury but a fundamental necessity.  

  

The escalating demand for cooling in India is projected to necessitate an additional 800 GW of power generation, exacerbating carbon emissions and accelerating climate change. With HVAC systems already accounting for up to 60% of energy costs, the people, the planet, and profit appear to be at cross\-roads with each other, making it imperative to decouple the gridlock.  

  

The answer to this impending conundrum lies in Energy Efficiency.  

We are Smart Joules. And, we are pioneering the journey towards profitable decarbonization.
Why Us?
OUR VISION  

To reduce 29 million tonnes of Co2 by 2030 by pioneering profitable decarbonization.  

  

OUR MISSION  

To make energy efficiency simple, substantial and profitable through cooling\-as\-a\-service business models, intelligent automation technologies and efficiency\-first processes, culture and values.

jobs.title: Email Marketing Specialist
jobs.description:
**Role Description**

This is a **full\-time on\-site role** for a **Email Marketing Executive**, based in Delhi, India. We are seeking an experienced Email Marketing Executive to join our growing team at **Nerditia**. We're seeking a results\-driven Email Marketing Specialist to join our performance marketing team. In this role, you'll design, execute, and optimize email campaigns that drive measurable growth for our diverse portfolio of B2B and B2C clients—from ecommerce brands to local businesses looking to increase sales or traffic or walk in crowd/leads. You'll be the strategic force behind campaigns that convert subscribers into customers and turn customers into loyal advocates.

**Pay Range: ₹15,000 \- ₹25,000 per month**

**Qualifications**

**Required Qualifications**

* Must be an immediate joiner. And willing to commute to the office on a daily basis.
* This is an **On\-site position** and therefore, you must be able to **commute to office location (Keshav Puram, Delhi) on a daily basis**. so do not apply if you are looking for a work from home or part time opportunity.
* Must have at least **2 years** of prior **Email Marketing Campaign** handling experience. Preferred: **2\-4 years of experience** in an agency or performance marketing environment
* Please do not apply if you have more than 5 years of experience as we are only looking for an intermediate candidate, not an exceptionally expert one.
* **Proven Track Record**: Demonstrable success in creating email campaigns that drive revenue, conversions, and engagement
* **Technical Proficiency**: Expert\-level experience with major email marketing platforms (Mailchimp, HubSpot, Klaviyo, SendGrid, ActiveCampaign, or similar ESPs)
* **Marketing Automation**: Strong experience building automated workflows and drip campaigns
* **Analytics Skills**: Proficiency in Google Analytics, email analytics tools, and data\-driven decision making
* **Copywriting**: Excellent writing and editing skills with ability to create persuasive, audience\-specific content (You can use AI to draft them but should be sensible enough to review the AI drafted content, do not use copy paste approach ever)
* Portfolio showcasing successful email campaigns with measurable results
* Experience scaling email programs from the ground up
* Knowledge of advanced segmentation and personalization strategies
* Understanding of email deliverability and sender reputation management
* Active participation in marketing communities or continuous learning initiatives

**Preferred Qualifications**

* Experience working with ecommerce platforms (Shopify, WooCommerce, Magento) and their email integrations
* Knowledge of HTML/CSS for email template customization
* Familiarity with CRM systems (Salesforce, Zoho, HubSpot CRM)
* Experience with multi\-channel campaign coordination
* Certifications in email marketing or marketing automation platforms
* Understanding of SMS marketing integration
* Experience in both B2B and B2C email marketing strategies

**Skills \& Competencies**

* **Analytical Mindset**: Strong ability to interpret data, identify patterns, and make data\-backed recommendations
* **Creativity**: Ability to develop innovative campaign concepts that stand out in crowded inboxes
* **Attention to Detail**: Meticulous approach to quality assurance, testing, and compliance
* **Project Management**: Excellent organizational skills with ability to manage multiple campaigns and deadlines
* **Communication**: Clear, professional communication skills for client interactions and internal collaboration
* **Adaptability**: Comfortable working in a fast\-paced environment with evolving priorities
* **Growth Mindset**: Proactive learner who stays current with email marketing trends and best practices

**Key Responsibilities**

**Campaign Strategy \& Execution**

* Develop and execute end\-to\-end email marketing campaigns aligned with client objectives and KPIs
* Create comprehensive email marketing strategies for multiple clients across B2B and B2C sectors
* Design customer journey maps and build automated email sequences (welcome series, cart abandonment, post\-purchase, re\-engagement, etc.)
* Conduct A/B and multivariate testing on subject lines, content, CTAs, send times, and audience segments to optimize performance

**Content \& Creative Development**

* Write compelling, conversion\-focused email copy that resonates with diverse target audiences
* Collaborate with designers to create visually engaging, mobile\-responsive email templates
* Ensure brand consistency while tailoring messaging for different client verticals and audience segments
* Develop personalized content strategies using dynamic content and segmentation

**Technical Implementation \& Management**

* Manage email marketing platforms (ESP) including list management, segmentation, and campaign deployment
* Implement marketing automation workflows and trigger\-based campaigns
* Ensure technical best practices including deliverability optimization, SPAM compliance, and email authentication (SPF, DKIM, DMARC)
* Maintain email lists hygiene, manage subscriber preferences, and ensure GDPR/CAN\-SPAM compliance

**Analytics \& Optimization**

* Monitor and analyze campaign performance metrics (open rates, click\-through rates, conversion rates, ROI, revenue per email)
* Generate comprehensive performance reports with actionable insights for clients
* Identify trends, opportunities, and areas for improvement across campaigns
* Set benchmarks and KPIs, continuously optimizing campaigns to exceed performance goals

**Client \& Stakeholder Management**

* Present campaign strategies, results, and recommendations to clients with confidence
* Collaborate with cross\-functional teams (paid media, SEO, content, design) to ensure integrated marketing approaches
* Stay updated on client industries, seasonal trends, and competitive landscape
* Manage multiple client accounts simultaneously while meeting deadlines

**Company Description**

**Nerditia** is a dynamic digital marketing agency, blending creativity with technology to deliver impactful results. Since its establishment in 2017, we have been helping clients navigate the complexities of the digital realm by offering specialized SEO, social media marketing (SMM), and content solutions. Our personalized strategies are meticulously crafted to meet the unique goals of each business, empowering them to enhance their online presence and achieve remarkable growth. At Nerditia, we pride ourselves on providing comprehensive support to our partners looking to excel in the digital space.

Job Types: Full\-time, Permanent

Pay: ₹15,000\.00 \- ₹25,000\.00 per month

Ability to commute/relocate:

* Keshav Puram, Delhi, Delhi: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required)

Application Question(s):

* Are you comfortable with the pay\-range being offered for this job position?
* Do you have a proven track record of the Email Marketing Campaign you've handled?
* We must fill this position urgently. Can you start immediately?

Experience:

* Email Marketing: 1 year (Required)

Work Location: In person

jobs.title: CGD_Dezy Corporate_Bengaluru
jobs.description:
We are looking for a proactive and detail\-oriented **Chief General Dentist** to lead our dental team and ensure the highest standards of patient care. The ideal candidate will oversee treatment planning, manage clinic operations, and foster seamless communication between patients, dental staff, and business teams. This role offers a unique opportunity to make a significant impact in a high\-growth environment while contributing to the overall success of our dental care services.**Requirements:*** **BDS/MDS with 2 to 3 years of experience in clinical dentistry**
* Past experience of working with digital tools and CRMs for DMS (Document Management Systems)
* Strong leadership and communication skills
* Organized, proactive, and detail\-oriented
* High empathy towards patients and their dental concerns

 **Specialties:** Invisible Smile Aligners, Dental Implants, Smile Makeovers, Root Canal, Teeth Whitening, Dental Veneers, Digital Consultation, and At Home Services**About Dezy****Dezy is India’s fastest growing** ***dental\-care technology company***, on a mission to transform how dental care is accessed and experienced. Founded in 2019, by IIM graduates and senior dentists, **Dezy is currently operating 25\+ clinics across India, with the vision to expand to 100\+ clinics by next year end.** We\`re backed by top Venture Capital funds like Chiratae, Alpha Wave and Peak XV, and Dezy has also been recognised by the World Economic Forum as one of the “Top 100 Technology Pioneers in the World” for revolutionizing dental care.
We blend clinical excellence, digital innovation, and community impact to build not just clinics, but an ecosystem for the future of oral health. **Why Join Dezy?****Dezy will not be like any other job in dentistry. This role will provide you a platform to build and grow your skills across clinic management, tech\-led clinical diagnosis and corporate leadership. We are different from other corporate clinic chains because:*** Tech\-Enabled Care, Human\-Driven: Dezy is a *digital\-first dental network*. Our platform uses AI\-powered diagnostics, teledentistry, and data\-driven protocols to ensure consistently high\-quality, patient\-centric care across our clinics.
* Clinician\-Entrepreneur Ecosystem: Our Chief General Dentists drive both clinical transformation and business growth, with meaningful ownership, performance\-based incentives, and leadership roles in Dezy’s expansion.
* Patient\-First, Outcome\-Focused: We believe in preventive dentistry, early intervention, and evidence\-based care.
* Learning, Growth \& Impact: Dezy is a place for dentists who dream big. Whether you're passionate about advanced clinical techniques or digital workflows you’ll find opportunities to learn, lead, and influence. We invest in continuous upskilling, mentorship, and career paths — from senior clinician to clinical leader to innovator.

**Hear directly from our Star CGDs!** **Dr Rishika****MDS, Pediatric \& Preventive Dentistry****Part of the Dezy family for the last 3\+ years** **“I joined as the CGD for Dezy\`s Hebbal clinic, where besides the varied clinical experience I received, I was also able to grow our revenue 5X over the span of two years. I got promoted to Zonal Head and now manage 15 clinics under me, giving me a chance to replicate clinic\-level success across the city. ”** **Key Responsibilities*** **Patient Journey \& Clinical Care**
* Conduct comprehensive dental examinations, diagnose oral health conditions, and create treatment plans in coordination with senior dentists.
* *Take charge of medical management of cases being held on pause due to medical reasons (like diabetes, thyroid,etc) and working closely with the patient and senior consultant to ensure all treatment plans are executed accurately and on time.*
* Perform routine dental procedures including intraoral scans, cleanings, fillings, temporary restorations, and other chairside treatments.
* Provide clear post\-treatment instructions and oral hygiene guidance to ensure patient comfort and long\-term dental wellness.

* **Documentation \& Clinical Systems**
* Maintain accurate and detailed patient records, including treatment plans, progress notes, scan reports, and medical histories.
* Ensure all clinical documentation is updated in the relevant systems/CRMs promptly and error\-free.
* Support seamless data flow by tracking treatment progress and updating case details as patients move through their care pathway.
* **Team Collaboration \& Support**
* Work closely with the Chief General Dentist, dental assistants, and administrative teams to deliver consistent and high\-quality patient care.
* Coordinate smoothly with cross\-functional teams to ensure treatment timelines, patient requirements, and clinic workflows are aligned.
* Contribute to maintaining a positive clinical environment through effective communication and teamwork.
* **Clinical Operations \& Patient Coordination**
* Ensure readiness of dental equipment, materials, and instruments before procedures.
* Maintain adherence to infection control and safety protocols across all treatment areas.
* Track patient follow\-ups, scheduled scans, and appointments to ensure timely care delivery.
* Provide assistance in managing daily patient flow to optimize clinic operations.
* **Relationship Management \& Outreach**
* Build and strengthen relationships with clinic partners, senior dentists, and external stakeholders within the region.
* Support outreach activities such as outbound coordination with partner dental chains and participation in trade fairs to enhance clinical visibility.
* Engage with patients proactively to encourage treatment acceptance and reinforce trust throughout the care journey.
* **Learning \& Professional Development**
* Stay updated on modern dental practices, including aligners, implants, and digital dentistry trends.
* Actively participate in training sessions, workshops, and clinical development programs to enhance clinical proficiency.
* Apply new learnings to elevate the standard of care and contribute to the clinic’s growth.

jobs.title: Software Engineer - Back-End & Agentic AI
jobs.description:
*Securonix is leading the transformation of cybersecurity by helping organizations stay ahead of modern threats.* *Security teams are no longer constrained by data or tools. They are constrained by speed, clarity, and confidence. Securonix was built to close that gap. Our mission is to enable security teams to decide and act faster across the entire threat lifecycle.*

  

*The Securonix Unified Defense SIEM is the industry’s first platform powered by agentic AI and designed with a human\-in\-the\-loop philosophy. It unifies detection, investigation, and response in a single system. Advanced UEBA delivers deep behavioral insight across users, entities, and data. Native threat intelligence continuously enriches detections and investigations with real\-world context. AI reinforces every layer of the platform while keeping accountability with the security team.*

  

*Built cloud\-native for scale and performance, the platform enables real\-time analytics, deep investigation, and automated response without compromise. Analysts gain faster access to relevant signals. Investigations move from days to minutes. Response becomes consistent and measurable. The result is a CyberOps experience that scales as threats evolve.*

  

*Securonix is recognized as a six\-time Leader in the Gartner Magic Quadrant for SIEM and a Customers’ Choice on Gartner Peer Insights. The company has been featured by leading publications including WIRED, Dark Reading, and Fortune for its innovation and leadership in security operations. Organizations rely on the platform for always\-available data, rapid search and investigation, continuously updated threat content, and a fully integrated Threat Detection, Investigation, and Response experience.*

  

*Backed by Vista Equity Partners, one of the world’s leading enterprise software investors, Securonix benefits from deep operational expertise and a long\-term commitment to innovation and growth. This partnership strengthens our ability to scale the platform, accelerate product execution, and support customers as their security needs evolve.*

  

*With more than 1,000 customers worldwide, including a meaningful portion of the Fortune 100, Securonix operates at global scale. Our ecosystem of partners and managed security service providers extends that reach, helping organizations deploy and operate with confidence wherever they do business. What drives us is how we work.*

  

* *We win as one team. We operate with trust, respect, and shared accountability.*
* *We are customer\-driven. Innovation is guided by real security challenges and measurable outcomes.*
* *We act with agility. Change is constant, and we stay aligned on purpose while adapting fast.*

  

  

*That focus is how Securonix helps organizations move from reactive security to proactive, autonomous operations.*

  

Securonix provides the Next Generation Security and Information Event Management (SIEM) solution. As a recognized leader in the SIEM industry, Securonix helps some of the largest organizations globally detect sophisticated cyberattacks and respond to them within minutes. The Securonix SNYPR platform is built on big data Hadoop technologies and is infinitely scalable. Our platform is used by some of the largest organizations in the financial, healthcare, pharmaceutical, manufacturing, and federal sectors.

 **Responsibilities:**

  

* Design, develop, and maintain our industry\-leading Threat Intelligence Platform – ThreatQ, with a focus on performance, scalability, and maintainability
* Collaborate with team members, product owners, and designers to implement product requirements
* Participate in code reviews, providing and receiving constructive feedback to maintain code quality standards
* Collaborate with product managers, security analysts, and other stakeholders to understand requirements and translate them into technical specifications.
* Develop and maintain high\-quality code, ensuring adherence to best practices and coding standards.
* Stay current with emerging technologies and industry trends in cybersecurity, integrating new tools and techniques into development processes as appropriate.
* Contribute to the development of technical documentation, including design specifications, user guides, and API documentation.

  


**Required Skills:**

  

* A minimum of 1\-3 years of experience with a bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related field.
* Sound Knowledge in Java/Python and object\-oriented programming principles
* Experience with SQL and database systems, such as MySQL, MariaDB
* Experience with front\-end technologies, such as React/AngularJS, JavaScript, HTML, TypeScript and CSS
* Good Knowledge on AI Tools \& Agent Integration Experience.
* Solid understanding of CI/CD development lifecycle. Hands\-on experience with GIT version control (Github/Bitbucket/GitLab).
* Experience with Java build tools, such as Maven or Gradle
* Familiarity with RESTful APIs and JSON
* Experience with testing frameworks and libraries, such as JUnit, Mockito, or TestNG
* Knowledge of microservices architecture and containerization technologies, such as Docker or Kubernetes
* Familiarity with cloud platforms, such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform
* Good problem\-solving skills and attention to detail
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills
* Experience working in Agile development environments
* Willingness to upskill in Laravel/PHP, IaC, SaaS Environment concepts and queue\-based architecture.

  


**Benefits:**

  



As a full\-time employee with Securonix, you will be eligible for the following employee benefits:

  


* Health Insurance with a total sum insured is INR 7,50,000
* Coverage: Self, Spouse, 2 kids, Dependent parents, or parents\-in\-law
* Personal Accident with total sum insured is INR 10,00,000
* Term Life Insurance with a sum assured for employees is 5 times fixed base pay is covered.

  



Securonix provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, genetic information, marital status, amnesty or status as a covered veteran in accordance with applicable federal, state and local laws.

  



Securonix complies with applicable state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment in every location where the company has facilities. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, and transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training.

jobs.title: Shared Services Manager
jobs.description:
Overview:

SSOE Group is seeking a Shared Services Manager to join our growing team in **Mumbai, India,** supporting our strategic global delivery model.
As part of SSOE’s **Global Workforce Optimization (GWO),** you’ll work side\-by\-side with U.S. and international colleagues to deliver large, complex projects across advanced manufacturing, semiconductors, battery, solar, and other industrial markets*.* Our multidisciplinary team in India is fully embedded in project delivery—contributing technical expertise, innovation, and execution excellence throughout the project lifecycle—positioning SSOE as a global powerhouse within AEC.  

Join SSOE and work on award\-winning projects, with award\-winning colleagues. SSOE is consistently recognized as a **Great Place to Work** and **Top 25 firm in the US by Building Design \+ Construction, Engineering News\-Record, and Consulting\-Specifying Engineer**. This role offers meaningful exposure to high\-quality projects, cross\-disciplinary collaboration, industry\-leading best practices, and the opportunity to make a global impact—with the stability, support, and growth opportunities of an employee\-owned firm.
Responsibilities:
**The following duties are typical of the position but are not all\-encompassing. Responsibilities include those required to deliver quality service on schedule and within budget in a team environment.**  

**Leadership \& Operations Management*** Oversee day‑to‑day operations of the Billing, AR, AP, and Payroll shared services teams.
* Ensure timely and accurate processing of invoices, collections, vendor payments, employee payroll, and related financial transactions.
* Monitor workflow, adjust staffing needs, and maintain appropriate workload distribution.
* Establish, track, and report on KPIs across all functions.

**Process Standardization \& Optimization*** Develop and maintain standardized processes, policies, and documentation across Billing, AR, AP, and Payroll.
* Identify and lead improvement shared services initiatives, including automation opportunities (ERP enhancements).
* Implement best practices to improve accuracy, reduce cycle times, and enhance customer satisfaction.
* Partner with IT and other departments on system upgrades and process integrations.

**Financial Accuracy, Controls \& Compliance*** Ensure all transactions are processed in alignment with GAAP, internal controls, and company policies.
* Develop Rate Schedules for company and specific clients to optimize return.
* Monitor and develop tools for proper cash control and forecasting.
* Reviews General Ledger for balances and appropriateness.
* Maintain robust controls related to billing accuracy, cash application, vendor setup, payroll processing, and approval workflows.
* Support internal and external audits, including documentation, reconciliations, and remediation plans.
* Oversee tax compliance related to payroll and vendor payments (e.g., W‑9/1099, garnishments, payroll tax filings).

**Customer \& Stakeholder Relations*** Serve as the primary point of contact for escalations related to billing issues, payment inquiries, payroll discrepancies, and process concerns.
* Collaborate with finance, HR, operations, and other business units to ensure alignment and service excellence.
* Communicate performance, improvement plans, and service delivery updates to leadership.

**Team Leadership \& Development*** Manage and develop a multi‑disciplinary shared services team across Billing, AR, AP, and Payroll.
* Set performance goals, conduct performance reviews, oversee training, and support career development.
* Ensure work teams are utilizing AI to enhance productivity.
* Promote a culture of accountability, teamwork, problem solving, and continuous improvement.

 **Note**:**This position is a permanent full\-time remote role to align with US (EST) work timings, specifically from 6:00 PM to 3:00 AM IST.**
Qualifications:
**In addition to competitive, market\-based compensation, this role is eligible for a comprehensive total rewards package designed to support your career, well\-being, and long\-term success.** **What we bring:*** **Salary Range:** 15 to 25 Lacs/year depending on location, education, experience, and any certifications directly related to the position. \[This role is eligible for overtime or premium pay, employee\-recognition programs, and additional annual incentive / discretionary bonuses, of which are based on company and individual performance and goals.]
* As an employee\-owned firm, eligible employees also have the opportunity to participate in SSOE’s stock ownership program, providing an additional level of earning and investment. **We offer ownership opportunities to all employees at the Associate level and above. (**This **Associate\-level role** will allow you an opportunity to become a shareholder of SSOE).
* Benefits include health insurance, accidental death \& disability, access to our Employee Assistance Program, and parental leave (paternity and maternity).
* SSOE contributes to statutory benefits programs that include gratuity and provident fund.

**Additional Perks Offered:**  

Experience a collaborative, people\-first culture where you’re not just a number—you’re a valued contributor.* Enjoy **work–life balance** through **flexible schedules, a hybrid / remote work environment, generous PTO, and paid holidays** designed to support your well‑being. \[This role is eligible for PTO carry\-over, compensatory offs, leave donation, the possibility for international travel, and flextime shifts to choose from in order to lessen the burden of the rush\-hour traffic in Mumbai.]
* Build direct **relationships with leadership** through regular access, open communication channels, and **structured mentorship** that supports both technical and professional growth.
* Engage in company‑funded, **employee****‑led clubs that strengthen connection, community, and cross****‑team collaboration**—creating a supportive workplace that extends beyond project work.
* Being part of a diverse team, you'll embark on thrilling projects from inception to completion and engage directly with some of the most innovative clients globally across industries and geographies—helping **insulate your career from economic shifts while continuously building new skills.**
* Embrace a culture of perpetual learning where **curiosity is celebrated, innovative ideas are welcomed, educational achievement is monetarily awarded, and your career growth aspirations are fully supported** with professional development, training, and resources you need to advance. \[This role is eligible for educational, licensure, and certification reimbursement.]

**Who We Need:**  

**Required Qualifications:*** Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, Business Administration, or related field.
* 10\+ years of experience in financial operations, shared services, or transactional finance (Billing, AR, AP, Payroll).
* 3\+ years of leadership or supervisory experience.
* Strong understanding of ERP systems.
* Demonstrated ability to manage high‑volume, deadline‑driven transactional environments.
* Solid understanding of internal controls, financial compliance, and payroll regulations.

**Preferred Qualifications:*** Certifications: CPP (Payroll), CMA, CPA, or similar credentials.
* Experience implementing or scaling a shared services model.
* Experience with Lean, Six Sigma, or continuous improvement methodologies.
* Experience with automation technologies.

**Key Competencies:*** Strong leadership and team\-building skills.
* Excellent analytical and problem‑solving ability.
* High attention to accuracy and detail.
* Strong communication and customer service mindset.
* Ability to manage competing priorities and deadlines.
* Comfort working with data, metrics, and process dashboards.

**SSOE– The Best of Both Worlds**  

At SSOE, our growth allows us to offer the opportunities typically associated with a large global firm—diverse projects, advanced technology, and international clients—while maintaining the collaborative, supportive culture often found in smaller organizations.
As a member of the SSOE team, you will work on exciting and diverse projects for Fortune 100 clients around the globe. Once you experience the SSOE difference, you’ll understand why our people stay and grow with us.* **1/4 \- global employees recommended SSOE to a friend since 2024\.**
* **1/4 \- of our employees have been with SSOE for 10 years or more.**
* **4/5 \- approval rating on Glassdoor.**
* **9/10 \- portion of our clients who say they would recommend us to a colleague.**

jobs.title: Sales Director
jobs.description:
About Gushwork  

Backed by Lightspeed, B Capital \& Beenext (Raised over $11M), Gushwork drives inbound leads for small and medium businesses from AI search engines like Gemini, ChatGPT \& Claude.We are backed by some of the top tier VCs of the world and are one of the fastest growing AI companies being built out of India for the world. We work with over 300\+ customers and are building a team to 10x our ARR in the next 12 months. We are a team of 60 hungry, ambitious \& hard working individuals and are adding more people to the team who share our desire to leave a lasting impact.  

The Role  

We're looking for a Sales Director to lead and scale our MB sales team. You'll be a hands\-on leader focused on coaching, deal acceleration, and building the sales infrastructure needed to hit aggressive growth targets. This is not a player\-coach role—you won't carry an individual quota, but you'll be deeply involved in your team's deals: joining calls, unblocking negotiations, and driving pipeline velocity. **Reports to:** Director, Growth**Location:** Bangalore, In\-Office**Experience Required:** 7\+ years in B2B SaaS sales, 2\+ Years in SMB SaaS
### **What You'll Own**

* **Build \& Execute the Outbound Motion (60% of time)**
* Manage and develop 8 Account Executives to begin with, and scale to a team of 50 in the next 12 months.
* Hit monthly team quota which is set ahead of the month starting.
* Run deal reviews, pipeline scrubs, and weekly 1:1s with each AE.
* Identify skill gaps and provide targeted coaching on discovery, demos, objection handlingBuild a culture of accountability, urgency, and continuous improvement.
* Own end\-to\-end outbound sales with a growing team of account executives: prospecting, qualification, demos, closingTest and iterate on messaging, positioning, and sales tactics

* **Establish Sales Infrastructure (25% of time)**
* Build the sales playbooks for different scenarios: scripts, objection handling, pricing frameworks.
* Implement and optimize CRM workflows (pipeline management, forecasting, reporting).
* Create deal qualification frameworks to improve win rates and reduce churn.
* Develop sales collateral: one\-pagers, case studies, ROI calculators, competitive battlecards.
Set up sales metrics and dashboards for pipeline visibility.  
* 

  

* **Set Foundation for Team Scaling (15% of time)**
* Document best practices and create training materials for future hires.
* Build repeatable hiring and onboarding processes.
* Hiring 50\+ account executives through the year.
* Establish and keep refining compensation structures and quota models based on business goals.

### **What We're Looking For**

* **Must\-Haves:**
* 7\+ years in B2B SaaS sales, with at least 2\+ years in closing roles and 2\+ years as a manager.
* Proven SMB velocity: Track record closing $1M ARR/year.
* Outbound expertise: Built or scaled outbound motion (cold email, cold calling, LinkedIn).
* Player\-coach DNA: Comfortable both closing deals yourself and building systems.
* Quota attainment: Consistent 100%\+ quota achievement in previous roles.
Technical aptitude: Able to learn and articulate complex product (AI/search/martech).  
* 

  

* **Strong Preferences:**
* Experience selling to non\-SaaS industries like manufacturing, distributors, servicesBackground selling marketing or sales solutions.
* Startup experience (seed to Series C stage, 0\-to\-1 sales building)

* **What Success Looks Like:**
* Expert at articulating ROI to SMB buyers with limited tech sophistication.
* Comfortable with high activity: 50\-100 demos/month/AECan translate technical product features into business outcomes.
* Resourceful and scrappy—thrives in ambiguity with limited resources.
* Data\-driven: Uses metrics to optimize and improve processes weekly.

We may use artificial intelligence (AI) tools to support parts of the hiring process, such as reviewing applications, analyzing resumes, or assessing responses. These tools assist our recruitment team but do not replace human judgment. Final hiring decisions are ultimately made by humans. If you would like more information about how your data is processed, please contact us.

jobs.title: Tech Lead – Cloud Platform
jobs.description:
##### **Bhosari MIDC, Pune**


**Location:** Pune


**Experience:** 3 to 6 Years.


**Job Description**


Welmade Locking Systems Pvt. Ltd., through its brand Europa Locks, has built a custom platform for its range of smart locks. This platform serves a highly cost\-sensitive market, with thousands of new users being added every month. The platform also supports a wide variety of products with differing specifications that are introduced on a regular basis. We are looking for an enthusiastic team member who can maintain, enhance, and lead the continued development of this platform.


* Lead development of the team to empower them in testing, bug resolution, cloud monitoring, and planning. Foster a collaborative team environment and motivate team members to achieve project goals.
* Develop and execute comprehensive project plans, defining scope, timelines, resources, and budgets specific IoT projects.
* Drive continuous improvements to the existing implementation.
* Lead the discovery phase for major upcoming enhancements and platform changes.
* Maintain existing implementation from the perspective of good user experience, cost control and high level of security.
* Demonstrate in\-depth understanding of cloud concepts and interactions between cloud components.
* Bring proven experience in setting up and managing cloud environments with one or more leading cloud service providers.
* Collaborate with solution partner teams and regularly monitor and track their progress.

**Candidate Profile:**


* Strong knowledge of cloud components for solution architecture, with a proven track record of implementing cloud\-based solutions. Hands\-on experience is essential.
* **Desired tech stack expertise:** **Frontend / Mobile:** React, Redux, TypeScript, Flutter **API Development:** RESTful API design, WebSockets (Socket.IO), Node.js **Authentication:** JWT implementation and management **Databases:** Experience with both SQL and NoSQL databases
* Prior experience working on IoT systems is preferred.
* Knowledge of strategies for designing and implementing high\-availability, high\-volume systems.
* In\-depth understanding of cybersecurity compliances, with hands\-on experience in implementing hardened and secure systems.
* Ability to analyze cloud deployments and optimize implementations for cost efficiency and improved user experience.
* Previous experience participating in platform security validation activities.
* Experience with Microsoft Azure is a plus.
* Familiarity with industry standards and experience in achieving compliance certifications will be an added advantage.

**Why work with us?**


* **Product\-Based Company:** As a product\-driven organization (not a service\-based firm), we offer a healthy work–life balance.
* **Indian Work Timings:** Work hours aligned with Indian time zones.
* **Excellent Job Security:** Stable organization with long\-term growth opportunities.
* **Meaningful Work:** Contribute directly to the “Make in India” initiative and help build world\-class products.
* **Full\-Stack Exposure:** Gain end\-to\-end visibility and hands\-on experience across the complete technology stack.

**Candidate Matching above Criteria should only apply.**


\[email protected]

  


NOTE \- All Offer Letters \& Appointment Letters are issued ONLY from the HEAD OFFICE duly signed by GM Operations, same would be couriered from HO. They are NEVER issued by hand / given across the table from any factory / sales location directly.

jobs.description:
**Head \- Sourcing, MSG**
=========================

Location:
Bangalore, KA, IN, 560073
On\-site or Remote: Onsite
REQ ID: 47176
***About Kennametal***


*With over 80 years as an industrial technology leader, Kennametal Inc. delivers productivity to customers through materials science, tooling and wear\-resistant solutions. Customers across aerospace and defense, earthworks, energy, general engineering and transportation turn to Kennametal to help them manufacture with precision and efficiency. Every day approximately 8,700 employees are helping customers in nearly 100 countries stay competitive. Kennametal generated $2\.1 billion in revenues in fiscal 2023\. Learn more at* *www.kennametal.com**. Follow @Kennametal: Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn and YouTube.*

  


**Job Title: Head – Sourcing**

  


**Job Summary**

  



The **Head – Sourcing** will be responsible for developing and implementing sourcing strategies to comply with Global and India sourcing policy. To ensure cost\-effective procurement, high\-quality standards, timely deliveries, and long\-term supplier partnerships. This position calls for a high level of **values, ethics, and integrity** in all business dealings. The incumbent will lead the sourcing, purchase, and vendor development teams and play a key role in strategic decision\-making to support business goals in productivity, profitability, and sustainability.

  


**Key Job Responsibilities**


**Strategic Sourcing \& Procurement**


* Formulate and execute comprehensive sourcing strategies aligned with business objectives.
* Develop global and domestic supplier bases for key components (mechanical, electrical, hydraulic, fabricated, machined).
* Drive cost reduction initiatives through value engineering, negotiation, and supplier optimization.
* Implement risk management processes to ensure supply continuity.


**Vendor Development \& Management**


* Identify, qualify, and develop reliable suppliers with a focus on quality, cost, and delivery.
* Establish long\-term vendor partnerships ensuring technological alignment and performance improvement.
* Conduct supplier audits and performance evaluations.


**Operations \& Compliance**


* Oversee day\-to\-day purchase operations, ensuring adherence to company policies and statutory compliances.
* Ensure timely availability of materials to meet production schedules.
* Drive procurement excellence through process standardization and system integration.
* Ensure full compliance with ethical sourcing practices and sustainability guidelines.


**Strategic Sourcing \& Procurement**


* Formulate and execute comprehensive sourcing strategies aligned with business objectives.
* Develop global and domestic supplier bases for key components (mechanical, electrical, hydraulic, fabricated, machined).
* Drive cost reduction initiatives through value engineering, negotiation, and supplier optimization.
* Implement risk management processes to ensure supply continuity.


**Vendor Development \& Management**


* Identify, qualify, and develop reliable suppliers with a focus on quality, cost, and delivery.
* Establish long\-term vendor partnerships ensuring technological alignment and performance improvement.
* Conduct supplier audits and performance evaluations.


**Operations \& Compliance**


* Oversee day\-to\-day purchase operations, ensuring adherence to company policies and statutory compliances.
* Ensure timely availability of materials to meet production schedules.
* Drive procurement excellence through process standardization and system integration.
* Ensure full compliance with ethical sourcing practices and sustainability guidelines.


  

**Financial \& Commercial Management**


* Manage annual sourcing budgets and monitor material cost trends.
* Negotiate contracts, Incoterms, and pricing to optimize working capital.
* Collaborate with finance to monitor supplier payment cycles and cost analysis.


**Technology \& Systems**


* Leverage **SAP** for procurement planning, purchase order management, and supplier tracking.
* Ensure continuous improvement and digitalization of procurement processes.


**Leadership \& Team Development**


* Lead and mentor a cross\-functional sourcing team.
* Foster a culture of collaboration, accountability, and innovation.
* Build capability within the team through training in negotiation, cost analysis, and supplier management.


**KPI’s**


* Annual cost reduction achievement (%).
* On\-time delivery and supplier performance index.
* Supplier quality metrics (rejection rates).
* Procurement process compliance score.
* Inventory turnover and material availability.
* Employee engagement and team development scores.

  


**Years of Relevant Work Experience Required:** 15 \+ Years

  


**Experience**


* **20 years** of total experience, with at least **5 years** in a leadership role as **Head of Sourcing / Purchase** in a **Capital Goods / Machine Tool / Heavy Engineering** organization.

  


**Education / Skills**


* Bachelor’s degree in mechanical engineering.
* Postgraduate qualification in **Materials Management / Production / Supply Chain Management**.
* Strong understanding of manufacturing processes, Foundry processes, machining, fabrication, hydraulics, and assembly.
* Proficiency in **SAP\-MM** / S4 HANA


Equal Opportunity Employer

  

  

**Job Segment:** SAP, Strategic Sourcing, Procurement, Machinist, ERP, Technology, Operations, Manufacturing

Job Title:
Head of Operations


Job Description:
The company is seeking an experienced Operations Director \- HVAC to oversee the operations of HVAC services. The role involves ensuring performance, safety, and customer satisfaction across multiple locations. Key responsibilities include operational leadership, stakeholder management, team development, compliance and safety adherence, financial oversight, and technology innovation. The ideal candidate should have a proven track record in managing HVAC projects, developing operational excellence strategies, and driving innovation in project delivery and maintenance services.


Experience Range:
15 \- 25 years


Educational Qualifications:
\-Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering , \-Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering , \-Bachelor's degree


Job Responsibilities:
* Lead the entire HVAC operations team, ensuring smooth day\-to\-day operations across all active sites and projects.
* Develop and implement operational processes and SOPs to ensure consistent service delivery.
* Oversee project management for installation, repair, and maintenance services, ensuring projects are delivered on time, within scope, and on budget.
* Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, stakeholders, other function heads and partners.
* Lead, motivate, and develop a high\-performing team to achieve excellence in all areas of operational excellence.
* Develop and manage operational budgets, ensuring cost efficiency without compromising quality.
* Drive the adoption of digital tools and technologies to streamline operations, enhance service delivery, and improve data accuracy.
* Develop and enforce safety standards and procedures to protect employees, customers, and the environment.


Skills Required:
HVAC Operations , Leadership , Project Management , Stakeholder Management , Team Development , Budget Management , Financial Oversight , Technology Adoption , Innovation , Mechanical Engineering , Electrical Engineering , Energy Efficiency , Sustainable Design , HVAC Systems Design , Installation , Repair , Maintenance , Building Codes , Regulations , Cross\-functional Team Leadership , Communication Skills , Interpersonal Skills , Problem\-solving , Risk Management , Mentoring , Strategic Planning , Operations Management


Candidate Attributes:
* 15\+ years of progressive experience in HVAC operations, with at least 5 years in a leadership role managing operations \& maintenance in large\-scale HVAC projects
* Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.
* Strong technical expertise in HVAC systems, energy efficiency, and sustainable design.
* Proficient in HVAC systems design, installation, repair, and maintenance with a strong grasp of building codes, regulations, and industry standards.
* Proven track record in managing projects with budgets exceeding INR 50 crore.
* Experience in leading cross\-functional teams and working with subcontractors.
* Strong interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to manage complex stakeholder relationships.
* Ability to work in a fast\-paced, dynamic environment and handle multiple projects simultaneously.


Job Code: KL\-PNEREBMA
About Us
As our planet faces the alarming reality of warming temperatures, India is confronting a critical challenge: by 2030, heat stress events could cost the nation 34 million full\-time jobs—equivalent to 5\.8% of its working hours. In this context, HVAC systems are no longer a luxury but a fundamental necessity.  

  

The escalating demand for cooling in India is projected to necessitate an additional 800 GW of power generation, exacerbating carbon emissions and accelerating climate change. With HVAC systems already accounting for up to 60% of energy costs, the people, the planet, and profit appear to be at cross\-roads with each other, making it imperative to decouple the gridlock.  

  

The answer to this impending conundrum lies in Energy Efficiency.  

We are Smart Joules. And, we are pioneering the journey towards profitable decarbonization.
Why Us?
OUR VISION  

To reduce 29 million tonnes of Co2 by 2030 by pioneering profitable decarbonization.  

  

OUR MISSION  

To make energy efficiency simple, substantial and profitable through cooling\-as\-a\-service business models, intelligent automation technologies and efficiency\-first processes, culture and values.

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobs.description:
As part of this exciting growth, we are looking for a skilled and adaptable Full Stack Engineer to support and evolve our production\-grade platform. The ideal candidate has hands\-on experience across both backend and frontend technologies and is capable of handling live system support, performance optimization and iterative feature development.


This role requires someone who can debug complex issues, deliver features end\-to\-end and collaborate across disciplines to continuously improve both the codebase and user experience.


**Key Responsibilities:**

**Feature Development \& Enhancements**

* Design and implement new features across the stack — from backend APIs to frontend UIs — in an **agile, iterative** manner.
* Collaborate with product managers and designers to translate business requirements into technical solutions.
* Apply **TDD/BDD** practices for predictable and verifiable development.
* Refactor existing code to improve maintainability, scalability, and testability.

**Production Support \& System Reliability**

* Support live services by monitoring system health, identifying bottlenecks and responding to incidents.
* Apply strong debugging and analytical skills to resolve issues in both backend and frontend layers.
* Work with observability tools like **Prometheus** , **Grafana** and logging systems to maintain uptime and performance.

**Backend Engineering**

* Develop microservices in **Kotlin** , applying **Domain\-Driven Design** principles.
* Build and manage event\-driven workflows using **Apache Kafka** and **Kafka Streams** .
* Implement **Role\-Based Access Control (RBAC)** within backend systems and service layers.
* Use **Maven** or **Gradle** to manage builds, dependencies, and project configurations.

**Frontend Engineering**

* Develop high\-quality UIs using **React** , **TypeScript** , and **Tailwind CSS** .
* Integrate map\-based interfaces with **MapLibre** for geospatial visualization.
* Apply **TDD/BDD** with tools like **Jest** and **React Testing Library** for frontend test coverage.

**DevSecOps \& CI/CD**

* Contribute to **CI/CD pipelines** using **GitHub Actions** for automated testing and deployments.
* Follow **DevSecOps** and **Lean Development** principles to ship secure, high\-quality code efficiently.

**Collaboration \& Ownership**

* Work cross\-functionally with backend, frontend, DevOps, and QA teams.
* Own features from conception to deployment and maintenance.
* Participate in code reviews, documentation, and continuous improvement initiatives.

**Required Skills:**

* **8\-13 years** of full stack development experience in production environments.
* Proficiency in **Kotlin** or **similar JVM\-based languages**
* Proficiency in **Spring boot** or **Ktor** .
* Hands\-on experience with **Apache Kafka** and **Kafka Streams.**
* frontend experience with **React** , **TypeScript** and **Jest** .
* Working knowledge of **Tailwind CSS** and component\-based UI design.
* Proficiency in **Git** for version control, including feature branching and pull request workflows.
* Hands\-on experience with **Kubernetes** , **Docker**
* Solid experience with SQL based database( **PostgreSQL)** .
* Solid understanding of **CI/CD pipelines** , observability tools ( **Prometheus** , **Grafana** ), and performance monitoring.
* Proficiency in **TDD/BDD** methodologies for both frontend and backend development.

**Preferred(Nice to Have) Skills:**

* Hands\-on experience with **WebSockets** and **Server\-Sent Events (SSE)** for real\-time data updates.
* Experience with **Maven** and/or **Gradle** for backend build and dependency management.
* Experience with **Keycloak** , **OAuth2/OIDC** and **LDAP** integration for identity and access management.
* Familiarity with **MapLibre** or any frontend mapping libraries (a plus for collaboration).
* Familiarity with **GraphHopper** , **OpenStreetMap** or other GIS technologies.
* Experience in **cloud platforms** (AWS, GCP, Azure) and **Private Cloud** infrastructure.
* **Familiarity with MongoDB**
* Experience working in Agile/Scrum teams and product\-driven environments.
* Knowledge of DevSecOps practices, SAST tools, and secure coding standards.
* Exposure to deployment strategies.

Maersk is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace, and we embrace different styles of thinking. Maersk is an equal opportunities employer and welcomes applicants without regard to race, colour, gender, sex, age, religion, creed, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, marital status, sexual orientation, physical or mental disability, medical condition, pregnancy or parental leave, veteran status, gender identity, genetic information, or any other characteristic protected by applicable law. We will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with all legal requirements.  



We are happy to support your need for any adjustments during the application and hiring process. If you need special assistance or an accommodation to use our website, apply for a position, or to perform a job, please contact us by emailing accommodationrequests@maersk.com .

jobs.description:
### **Job Information**


Industry


**IT Services**Date Opened


**12/26/2025**Job Type

**10\+**City

**500081**### **Job Description**


At Prolifics, we are currently implementing multiple solutions and we are looking to hire talented Mulsoft Lead for our development centre in India. This position would be based out of Hyderabad and is a permanent position.

  

If you are looking for a high growth company with rock\-solid stability, if you thrive in the energetic atmosphere of high\-profile projects, we want to talk to you today! Let’s connect and explore possibilities of having you onboard the Prolifics team!

  

Job Title: Mulesoft Lead

  

Primary Skill: MuleSoft with Salesforce, SAP, databases, and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP), enterprise systems.

  

Secondary Skill: Strong understanding of CI/CD, Git, Jenkins, and containerization concepts (Docker/Kubernetes).

  

Location: Hyderabad

  

Educational Qualification: B.Tech/BE/M.Tech/MCA/M.Sc

  

YOE: 8\-12 yrs

 **Job Description:**

 **Key Responsibilities**

 **Solution Architecture \& Design**

  

* Architect scalable, secure, and reusable integration solutions based on API\-led connectivity principles, ensuring alignment with business objectives.
* Define integration patterns, design reusable assets (RAML, DataWeave, connectors), and establish best practices.
* Create and review High\-Level and Low\-Level Designs (HLD/LLD) ensuring consistency with enterprise architecture standards.

 **Project Leadership**

  

* Lead end\-to\-end MuleSoft delivery projects, from requirement analysis through deployment and support.
* Provide technical leadership to developers and integration engineers; conduct code reviews, enforce quality gates, and mentor junior team members.
* Collaborate with business, architecture, QA, and DevOps teams to ensure timely, high\-quality delivery.

 **Pre\-Sales \& Solution Consulting (Optional / Desired)**

  

* Participate in discovery sessions and technical workshops with customers to understand requirements and propose integration strategies.
* Support proposal creation, effort estimation, and technical solutioning for RFP/RFI responses.
* Translate complex technical concepts into business outcomes for non\-technical stakeholders, demonstrating the value of integration in driving business transformation.

 **Technical Implementation**

  

* Develop and configure MuleSoft flows, APIs, and connectors using Anypoint Studio, DataWeave, and API Manager.
* Manage CI/CD pipelines and deployments to CloudHub 1\.0, CloudHub 2\.0, or Runtime Fabric, ensuring operational excellence.
* Implement logging, monitoring, and alerting for integration performance, scalability, and reliability.

 **Governance \& Best Practices**

  

* Establish and enforce coding standards, security guidelines, and design principles for all MuleSoft projects.
* Lead adoption of DevOps, Agile, and continuous improvement practices to streamline integration delivery.
* Stay current with MuleSoft updates, integration trends, and API management advancements, bringing innovation into projects.

 **Key Skills \& Qualifications**

 **Technical Expertise**

  

* Extensive experience with the MuleSoft Anypoint Platform, including Anypoint Studio, API Manager, Runtime Manager, Partner Manager, Exchange, and Anypoint Code Builder.
* Proficient in both CloudHub 1\.0 and 2\.0 deployment models; experience with hybrid deployment is preferred.
* Proven experience designing and implementing integration solutions using API\-led architecture, integration patterns, microservices, and domain\-driven design.
* Experience integrating MuleSoft with Salesforce, SAP, databases, and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP), as well as other enterprise systems.
* Strong understanding of CI/CD, Git, Jenkins, and containerization concepts (Docker/Kubernetes).
* Hands\-on proficiency in Java, Spring Boot, and DataWeave transformations.
* Knowledge of MuleSoft Automation components such as RPA, IDP, Composer, and MuleSoft Partner Manager is a plus.
* Exposure to API security, OAuth2, and performance tuning best practices.
* MuleSoft Certified Developer is expected.

 **Leadership \& Communication:**

  

* Demonstrated ability to lead cross\-functional teams and manage stakeholder expectations effectively.
* Excellent communication, presentation, and documentation skills. Able to translate technical designs into business values and outcomes.
* Experience in a customer\-facing consulting role, with a passion for understanding customer challenges and proposing impactful solutions.

 **Certifications (Preferred):**

  

* MuleSoft Certified Integration Architect – Level 1
* MuleSoft Certified Platform Architect – Level 1

 **About us:**

**Job Description**
-------------------

**Role: ERP/SAP Senior Project Manager**

**About Us**


We are taking a bold step forward to create a **future\-ready organization** that evolves at the speed of science and technology. Our mission is to meet the needs of patients by incorporating novel digital capabilities, data\-driven insights, and agile methodologies.  

Our goal is to deliver **personalized digital solutions** that empower patients to actively manage their care journey—from diagnosis through treatment and beyond.


Our IT team plays a pivotal role in accelerating this transformation through **Innovation Capability Solutions and Services (ICSS)**. Together, we design and deliver products and technologies that enable these foundational aspirations.

**The Opportunity**


We are seeking an **experienced ERP/SAP Senior Project Manager** to lead complex ERP projects and ensure successful delivery of enterprise solutions. This role will focus on **end\-to\-end project management**, driving execution, managing stakeholders, and ensuring alignment with business objectives—not only within SAP but across related systems and integrations.


If you have a proven track record in **ERP/SAP implementations and enterprise transformation**, we encourage you to apply.


A key aspect of this role will be **managing consulting partners, guiding project decisions, and ensuring delivery of robust technical solutions**.

**Key Responsibilities**

* **Lead and manage ERP/SAP projects** from initiation through delivery, ensuring scope, timeline, and budget adherence.
* Develop and maintain **detailed project plans**, including milestones, dependencies, and resource allocation.
* Collaborate with **business and IT stakeholders** to define requirements and ensure alignment with organizational goals.
* Manage **vendor and consulting partner relationships**, ensuring quality and cost\-effectiveness.
* Oversee **data migration, system integration, and master data governance** activities.
* Monitor and manage **project risks, issues, and dependencies**, implementing mitigation strategies.
* Ensure compliance with **GXP, SOX, and cybersecurity standards**, maintaining audit readiness.
* Drive **organizational change management**, including stakeholder engagement, training, and adoption strategies.
* Champion **Agile practices** (Scrum, Kanban, SAFe) where applicable, fostering adaptability and continuous improvement.
* Provide **regular status updates and executive\-level reporting** on progress, risks, and achievements.
* Conduct **post\-project reviews**, capture lessons learned, and implement process improvements.

**Skills and Qualifications Required**

* Proven experience in **ERP/SAP project management**, ideally end\-to\-end delivery.
* Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field (**Master’s preferred**).
* **6\+ years** of project management experience with successful software delivery track record.
* Exceptional **leadership, communication, and stakeholder management** skills.
* Strong **problem\-solving and strategic thinking** abilities.
* Proficiency in **project management tools and methodologies**.
* Demonstrated experience in **budget management and financial oversight**.
* High adaptability and ability to navigate ambiguity and change.

**Desired**

* **PMP or equivalent certification**.
* Experience in **pharmaceutical or life sciences industries**.
* Hands\-on experience with **SAP S/4HANA** (on\-premise or cloud).
* Knowledge of **ITIL frameworks**, cloud ERP deployments, and global vendor management.
* Ability to lead **cross\-functional and global teams**.

* Comply with the terms and conditions of the employment contract, company policies and procedures, and any and all directives (such as, but not limited to, transfer and/or re\-assignment to different work locations, change in teams and/or work shifts, policies in regard to flexibility of work benefits and/or work environment, alternative work arrangements, and other decisions that may arise due to the changing business environment). The Company may adopt, vary or rescind these policies and directives in its absolute discretion and without any limitation (implied or otherwise) on its ability to do so

**Required Qualifications:**

* B.Com/M.Com, MBA Finance, CA Inter, equivalent experience ( 8\+ years) \- CA's (6\+ Years Post Qualification)

Solid understanding of U.S. GAAP and Financial Statements
* Comes with good experience working with reporting tools like Blackline, Concur, Ariba, Hyperion smartview and PeopleSoft General ledger
* Advance proficiency utilizing Microsoft Office Suite applications (Advanced Excel, Word, Powerpoint)
* Past experience working with general ledger / sub\-ledger accounting applications
* Analytical skills and an eye for detail. Hands on exposure to:
	+ Variance analysis \& commentary writing
	+ Balance Sheet reconciliations, investigate and resolve reconciling items
	+ GL ledger accounting (Preparing / Posting Journals, Accruals, Reversing Journals etc.)
	+ Correctly applying US GAAP and company practices to assigned work
	+ Running queries in a general ledger system
	+ Responding to internal and external auditor requests
	+ Proposing solutions to noted problems
	+ Documenting methodology, analysis and conclusions
* Excellent Written and verbal communication skills
* Ability work independently in self\-directed manner and able to handle multiple tasks
* Anticipate customer needs and proactively develop solutions to meet them

 **Preferred Qualification:**

* Finance experience in any insurance industry. (health insurance industry preferred).
* Intermediate proficiency with Microsoft Access/VBA/Power Query/SQL etc.

  

Work Hours: Regular shift hours : 3\.30 PM to 1:00 AM IST


Monthend/quarter/year end: Shadow US work hours ( 6:00 PM to 3\.30 AM IST )

 *At UnitedHealth Group, our mission is to help people live healthier lives and make the health system work better for everyone. We believe everyone \- of every race, gender, sexuality, age, location and income \- deserves the opportunity to live their healthiest life. Today, however, there are still far too many barriers to good health which are disproportionately experienced by people of color, historically marginalized groups and those with lower incomes. We are committed to mitigating our impact on the environment and enabling and delivering equitable care that addresses health disparities and improves health outcomes \- an enterprise priority reflected in our mission.*

**About the Role**  

We are seeking a dynamic and results\-driven Business Operations Manager to oversee and drive operational excellence for JCool across India. The ideal candidate will be responsible for end\-to\-end operational management, owning the P\&L, ensuring seamless coordination between stakeholders, and delivering high\-quality, cost\-effective services to clients.

**Key Responsibilities**

* **P\&L Ownership**


	+ Take complete ownership of the Profit \& Loss statement for all India operations.
	+ Monitor operational expenses and revenues to ensure profitability and budget adherence.
	+ Identify opportunities to improve cost efficiency without compromising service quality.
* **Stakeholder Coordination**


	+ Collaborate closely with internal teams, including Operations and Projects, to ensure smooth handover and timely commencement of operations at new sites.
	+ Establish clear communication channels and workflows for seamless project\-to\-operations transitions.
* **Vendor Management**


	+ Build and maintain strong relationships with vendors to ensure timely, cost\-effective, and high\-quality service delivery.
	+ Negotiate contracts and manage vendor performance against agreed KPIs.
	+ Ensure compliance with safety, quality, and legal requirements.
* **Client Relationship Management**


	+ Act as the primary point of contact for clients, handling operational and techno\-commercial discussions.
	+ Proactively address client concerns and ensure high satisfaction levels.
	+ Build long\-term partnerships by delivering consistent value and service excellence.
* **Billing \& Budget Adherence**


	+ Ensure timely and accurate billing in alignment with project milestones and service delivery.
	+ Monitor budget utilization and take corrective actions to avoid overruns.
	+ Work with finance teams to streamline billing processes and collections.


Experience Range:
3 \- 6 years


Educational Qualifications:
Any graduation


Skills Required:
Business Operations , Stakeholder Management , Activity Coordination


Job Code: KL\-MX9ZKL9F
About Us
As our planet faces the alarming reality of warming temperatures, India is confronting a critical challenge: by 2030, heat stress events could cost the nation 34 million full\-time jobs—equivalent to 5\.8% of its working hours. In this context, HVAC systems are no longer a luxury but a fundamental necessity.  

  

The escalating demand for cooling in India is projected to necessitate an additional 800 GW of power generation, exacerbating carbon emissions and accelerating climate change. With HVAC systems already accounting for up to 60% of energy costs, the people, the planet, and profit appear to be at cross\-roads with each other, making it imperative to decouple the gridlock.  

  

The answer to this impending conundrum lies in Energy Efficiency.  

We are Smart Joules. And, we are pioneering the journey towards profitable decarbonization.
Why Us?
OUR VISION  

To reduce 29 million tonnes of Co2 by 2030 by pioneering profitable decarbonization.  

  

OUR MISSION  

To make energy efficiency simple, substantial and profitable through cooling\-as\-a\-service business models, intelligent automation technologies and efficiency\-first processes, culture and values.

**JOB DESCRIPTION**

Job Title : Senior Campus Manager

Job Type : Full Time

* ***About CMR Group***

CMR Group of Institutions is a unique education conglomerate based in Bangalore, India, that offers a wide range of courses from the Montessori / Kindergarten level to postgraduate and PhD programs. Founded in 1991 to meet the needs of local students, CMR Group currently comprises different brands of schools \& colleges, namely, CMRIT Bangalore, Ekya Schools, CMR National Colleges \& the CMR University which was established in 2013\.
